src: 委內瑞拉有 18% 的人失業，而大部分受雇的人從事地下經濟的工作。 三分之二的委內瑞拉工作人口從事服務業，將近四分之一的人從事工業，五分之一的人從事農業。 委內瑞拉人的重要產業是石油，僅管只有百分之一的人口在石油業工作，該國卻是石油淨出口國。
mt: 18% of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the underground economy. Two-thirds of Venezuela's working population is in the service sector, nearly a quarter is in industry, and one-fifth is in agriculture. Venezuela's main industry is oil, even though only 1% of the population works in the oil industry, the country is a net exporter of oil.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: 星星會發出光和熱，這是因為氫原子會在融合形成質量更重的元素時產生能量。 科學家正努力打造一種可透過相同方式產生能源的反應器。 然而，這是一道艱澀的難題，在我們看到實用的核子反應器建造之前，需要花上許多年才能解決。
mt: Stars emit light and heat because hydrogen atoms release energy when they fuse to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to build a reactor that can do the same. But it's a tough problem, and it will take many years before we see a practical nuclear reactor built.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: 元素和化合物可以從一種狀態移動到另外一種狀態時，而本質不會產生變化。 氮在氣態之下，仍然與液態氮具有相同的性質。儘管液態密度較高，但兩者分子組成是一樣的。 水是另一個例子。水是由兩個氫原子和一個氧原子組成的。 不論是氣體、液體或固體型態，都有相同的分子結構。 雖然它的物理狀態可能會改變，但它的化學狀態依舊不變。
mt: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another without changing their nature. Nitrogen in the gaseous state still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. Although the density is higher, the molecules are the same. Water is another example. Water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. Regardless of the gaseous, liquid, or solid state, it has the same molecular structure. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: 在獨立戰爭期間，這十三個州首先根據《邦聯條例》成立了脆弱的中央政府（而國會是它唯一的機構）。 國會沒有權力徵稅，又因為沒有國家行政或司法部門，所以必須仰賴往往互不合作的各州權力機構執行法律。 它也沒有權力撤銷州與州之間的稅法和關稅。 這些條例需要所有州全體一致的同意才能進行修改，而各州對中央政府的態度非常草率，他們的代表時常缺席。
mt: 13 of these states first formed a weak central government under the Articles of Confederation during the Revolutionary War. The Congress had no power to tax, and because there was no national executive or judiciary, it had to rely on the often uncooperative state governments to enforce laws. It also had no power to repeal state-to-state tariffs. These articles required unanimous approval of all states to be amended, and the states' attitude towards the central government was very casual, with their representatives often absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: 在獨立戰爭期間，這十三個州首先根據《邦聯條例》成立了脆弱的中央政府（而國會是它唯一的機構）。 國會沒有權力徵稅，又因為沒有國家行政或司法部門，所以必須仰賴往往互不合作的各州權力機構執行法律。 它也沒有權力撤銷州與州之間的稅法和關稅。 這些條例需要所有州全體一致的同意才能進行修改，而各州對中央政府的態度非常草率，他們的代表時常缺席。

src: 如果你曾看過電影《國家寶藏》，你可能會以為《美國獨立宣言》的背面畫有一張藏寶圖。 然而，那並非事實。雖然文件背面有一些手寫的內容，但它並不是一張藏寶圖。 《美國獨立宣言》背面的文字是「1776 年 7 月 4 日獨立宣言正本」。文字是以上下顛倒方式寫在底部。 雖然沒人知道這段文字是由誰書寫的，但確定的是這份巨大的羊皮紙文件（長寬約 29¾ 英吋乘以 24½ 英吋）早期為捲起收藏。 因此，會加上這段話很有可能只是為了做標示。
mt: If you've seen the movie National Treasure, you may think that the back of the Declaration of Independence has a treasure map. However, that's not the case. While there are some handwritten notes on the back, it's not a treasure map. The text on the back of the Declaration of Independence is "Original Declaration of Independence July 4, 1776." The text is written in reverse on the bottom. While no one knows who wrote the text, it's certain that this large sheepskin document (approximately 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage early on. Therefore, adding this text may have just been for labeling.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: 在國家獨立的初期，新加坡植物園的專業知識協助將此島嶼轉變成一個熱帶花園城市。 1981 年，一種蘭花雜交種「卓錦萬代蘭」被獲選為該國國花。
mt: 1981, a hybrid orchid called "Vanda Miss Joaquim" was selected as the national flower of Singapore.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: 雖然石製金字塔的建造一直延續到古王國末期，但吉薩金字塔的施工規模和卓越技術無人可及。 新王國時期的古埃及人對於他們祖先留下的歷史遺跡感到非常吃驚，當時這些遺跡已經超過千年之久了。
mt: Although the construction of stone pyramids continued into the Late Period, the scale and technical excellence of the Great Pyramid of Giza were unmatched. The New Kingdom Egyptians were astonished by the historical monuments left by their ancestors, which were already over a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: 每年十月左右，都有將近 150 萬隻草食動物為了雨水，會從北邊的山丘跨越馬拉河，遷移至南方的平原。 四月左右的雨季後，牠們再次跨過馬拉河，然後經由西部回到北方。 塞倫蓋蒂區域包括坦尚尼亞的塞倫蓋蒂國家公園、恩戈羅恩戈羅保護區和馬斯瓦野生動物保護區，以及肯亞的馬賽馬拉保護區。
mt: Every October, nearly 1.5 million herbivores cross the Mara River to move to the plains in the south. In April, after the rainy season, they cross the Mara River again and return to the north through the west. The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti National Park in Tanzania, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and the Maswa Wildlife Reserve, and the Maasai Mara Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: 征討法國的戰爭結束後，德國開始準備入侵不列顛群島。 德國給那次攻擊取了「海獅計畫」的代號。英國軍隊從敦克爾克撤退時，大多數的重型武器和補給品都沒了，所以那時的英軍相當虛弱。 但皇家海軍仍比德國海軍 (Kriegsmarine) 強大許多，並可摧毀任何欲入侵英吉利海峽的艦隊。 然而，很少皇家海軍軍艦已易受攻擊的路線附近為基地，因為艦隊司令們害怕他們會被德軍的空襲擊沉。
mt: After the war against France ended, Germany began preparing to invade the British Isles. The Germans called the attack "Operation Sealion." The British army retreated from Dunkirk with most of its heavy weapons and supplies, so the British were in a very weak position. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German navy (Kriegsmarine) and could destroy any fleet that tried to invade the English Channel. However, few Royal Navy ships were based near the vulnerable route because the fleet commanders were afraid they would be sunk by German air attacks.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: 我們先解釋一下義大利的計畫。義大利主要是德國和日本的「小跟班」。 其陸軍及海軍較弱，雖然戰爭開始前不久才剛打造四艘新艦。 義大利的主要目標是非洲國家。為了攻佔那些國家，他們需有軍隊可用的跳板，使軍隊能夠渡過地中海並侵略非洲。 為此，他們必須除掉英國在埃及的基地和船隻，除了這些行動之外，義大利戰艦不該涉及其他事情。 再來是日本，日本和英國一樣是島國。
mt: 1. We first explain the Italian plan. Italy is Germany and Japan's "little brother". Its army and navy are weak, although it just recently built four new ships. Italy's main target is African countries. In order to conquer those countries, they need a base for their army to use to cross the Mediterranean and invade Africa. For this, they must eliminate the British base and ships in Egypt, except for these actions, Italian warships should not be involved in other things. 2. Next is Japan, Japan and Britain are both island nations.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: 諾曼第登陸與隨後的戰役使法國北部重獲自由，但南部仍未解放。 當地由法國「維希」人 (Vichy) 所統治。 這些法國人在 1940 年與德國人和睦相處，並與侵略者合作而非對抗。 1940 年 8 月 15 日，同盟國進攻法國南部，史稱「龍騎兵行動」。 在短短兩週內，美軍和自由法國軍就解放了南法，並轉向德國。
mt: The Normandy landings and subsequent battles freed northern France, but southern France remained under Vichy French control. These French people had been living peacefully with the Germans since 1940 and were cooperating with the invaders rather than fighting them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies attacked southern France, known as Operation Dragoon. In just two weeks, American and Free French forces liberated southern France and turned on the Germans.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: 潛水艇是專門用於水下行進的船隻，可以延長在水下停留的時間。 第一次和第二次世界大戰都使用了潛水艇。當時潛水艇移動得很慢，而且射程極有限。 在戰爭剛開始時，它們大多在海面上移動，但隨著雷達的研發開始和變得越來越精確後，潛水艇被迫潛入水中以避免被看見。 德國潛水艇稱為「U 艇」。德國人非常擅長駕駛和操控他們的潛水艇。 由於德國人在潛水艇方面的成功，戰後人們對德國人擁有太多潛水艇感到不信任。
mt: Submarines are ships designed to move underwater, and can stay submerged for longer periods of time. They were used in both the First and Second World Wars. At first, they moved on the surface, but as radar became more accurate, they were forced to submerge to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very good at driving and controlling their submarines. Because of the Germans' success with submarines, people were suspicious of the Germans having too many submarines after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 在 1939 年 9 月 17 日之時，波蘭防線已失守，唯一的希望是撤退，並在羅馬尼亞的橋頭堡旁重新整頓。 然而，這些計畫在一夜之間全都報廢了。超過 80 萬名蘇聯紅軍違反《里加和約》、《波蘇互不侵犯協定》和其它雙邊與多邊的國際協定入侵波蘭東部，並在隨後進入白俄羅斯與烏克蘭，形成白俄羅斯與烏克蘭戰線。
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish front had already collapsed, the only hope was to retreat and reorganize in the bridgehead of Romania. However, these plans were all scrapped in one night. Over 800,000 Soviet Red Army violated the "Riga Peace Treaty", "Poland-Soviet Non-Aggression Pact" and other bilateral and multilateral international agreements invaded the eastern part of Poland, and then entered Belarus and Ukraine, forming the Belarus and Ukraine front.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: 幾乎從一開始，義大利人在北非的進展就很不順利。在義大利於 1940 年 6 月 10 日宣戰後一週內，英國第 11 輕騎兵團就佔領了利比亞的卡普佐堡。 在巴第亞東部的一次伏擊中，英軍俘虜了義大利第十軍團的工兵總隊長拉斯圖奇將軍。 6 月 28 日，利比亞總督—明顯是墨索里尼 (Mussolini) 的繼承者伊塔洛·巴爾博 (Italo Balbo) 元帥，在登陸圖卜魯格時被友軍炮火炸死。
mt: The Italians had a hard time in North Africa from the start. Within a week of Italy declaring war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had taken Capuzzo Fort in Libya. In a surprise attack in Bardia's east, the British captured the chief of the Italian Tenth Army's engineer regiment, General Rastelli. On June 28, Libya's governor — obviously Mussolini's heir apparent, Marshal Italo Balbo — was killed by friendly fire while landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: 幾乎從一開始，義大利人在北非的進展就很不順利。在義大利於 1940 年 6 月 10 日宣戰後一週內，英國第 11 輕騎兵團就佔領了利比亞的卡普佐堡。 在巴第亞東部的一次伏擊中，英軍俘虜了義大利第十軍團的工兵總隊長拉斯圖奇將軍。 6 月 28 日，利比亞總督—明顯是墨索里尼 (Mussolini) 的繼承者伊塔洛·巴爾博 (Italo Balbo) 元帥，在登陸圖卜魯格時被友軍炮火炸死。
mt: The Italians had a hard time in North Africa from the start. Within a week of Italy declaring war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had taken Capuzzo Fort in Libya. In a surprise attack in Bardia's east, the British captured the chief of the Italian Tenth Army's engineer regiment, General Rastelli. On June 28, Libya's governor — obviously Mussolini's heir apparent, Marshal Italo Balbo — was killed by friendly fire while landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: 藏傳佛教以佛陀的教義為基礎，但因大乘佛教的愛之道路與印度瑜伽的許多技巧，使得藏傳佛教得以發揚光大。 藏傳佛教原則上非常簡單，包括亢達里尼瑜伽、冥想和擁抱眾生的奉愛修行。 在做昆達里尼瑜珈時，昆達里尼能量（啟蒙能量）會透過瑜珈動作、呼吸運動、曼特羅禱文和視覺化而甦醒。 藏傳佛教的冥想核心是本尊瑜伽。透過觀想神佛，淨化所有的能量通道，啟動脈輪，建立開悟意識。
mt: The Tibetan Buddhist tradition is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but because of the path of love of Mahayana Buddhism and many techniques of yoga in India, Tibetan Buddhism was able to flourish. Tibetan Buddhism is basically very simple, including Kundalini yoga, meditation and loving embrace of the loving practice. When doing Kundalini yoga, Kundalini energy (awakening energy) will be awakened through yoga movements, breathing movements, mantras and visualization. The core of Tibetan Buddhist meditation is the practice of the deity. Through the visualization of gods and goddesses, purify all energy channels, activate chakras, and establish enlightened consciousness.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: 表演節目從當地時間晚間 8 點半開始（UTC 15:00 ）。 全國的知名歌手朝 Shri Shyam 的腳下獻上了拜讚歌，或稱奉獻歌。 歌手桑傑‧夏滿揭開了晚場的序幕，隨後登場的是傑‧香卡‧喬杜理。拉克‧辛格也獻唱了拜讚歌 chhappan bhog。陪同他表演的是歌手拉朱‧坎德瓦。 然後由拉卡．辛領銜帶唱拜讚歌。 108 盤夏潘柏格（在印度教中，供奉神靈的 56 種不同的食品，例如糖果、水果、堅果、菜餚等）被供奉給了巴巴夏母。 拉克辛也獻上 56 饗聖歌。歌手拉朱坎德爾沃爾則陪他獻唱。
mt: 8:30 p.m. local time (15:00 UTC) performances began. National singers sang at the feet of Shri Shyam, or offering songs. Singer Sanjay Gagnani opened the evening's proceedings, followed by Jai Shankar Jha, and then by Lakh Singh. He was accompanied by singer Lajja Kandewar. Then Lakh Singh led the offering of 108 chhappan bhog (56 different foods, such as candy, fruit, nuts, and dishes, offered to the gods in Hinduism). Lakh Singh also sang 56 offering songs. Singer Lajja Kandewar accompanied him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. src: 慶祝活動以世界知名的太陽馬戲團特別演出揭開序幕。 緊接著是伊斯坦堡國家交響樂團 (Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra) —一支軍樂隊，以及歌手法蒂赫·埃爾科克 (Fatih Erkoç) 和穆斯呂姆·古爾斯 (Müslüm Gürses)。 接著是土耳其旋轉舞表演。 土耳其天后蘇珊‧雅克蘇與義大利男高音亞歷山大‧沙費納和希臘歌手哈麗絲‧亞力克西烏同臺演出。 在結尾，土耳其舞蹈團體「安納托利亞之火」 表演了「特洛伊」這個戲碼。
mt: The celebrations kicked off with a special performance by the world-famous Sun Circus. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a military band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses followed. Next came a Turkish folk dance performance. Turkish diva Sükran Gürel performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The show ended with a performance by the Anatolian Fire dance troupe, performing the “Trojan” scene.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: 在華氏 90 度的高溫中，等待中的乘客得以補充水份。 消防隊長史考特·考恩斯說：「那天聖塔克拉拉非常炎熱，氣溫為華氏 90 幾度。」 退一步來說，無論困在雲霄飛車上的時間長短，這都是令人非常不舒服的經歷，而且至少要花一個小時才能把第一個人從雲霄飛車上救下來。」
mt: Passengers waiting in the heat were able to rehydrate. Fire Chief Scott Cowen said, "It was very hot in Santa Clarita that day, 90 degrees Fahrenheit."  In the end, it was an uncomfortable experience, and at least an hour passed before the first person was rescued from the ride.
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: 依據最新公告，海平面讀數顯示有海嘯發生。帕果帕果及紐埃附近有明確的海嘯活動紀錄。 東加並未回報任何重大損壞或傷亡，但據稱暫時的電力中斷妨礙了東加相關單位接收太平洋海嘯警報中心 (PTWC) 發出之海嘯警報。 儘管警告解除了，位於夏威夷海岸線上或附近的十四所學校仍然全數在星期三全日停課。
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred. There are clear tsunami observations near Pago Pago and Niue.  No major damage or casualties have been reported in American Samoa, but power outages have prevented the American Samoa Emergency Management Office from receiving the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center's (PTWC) tsunami warning.  Although the warning has been cancelled, fourteen schools along the Hawaii coastline or near the coastline are closed for the entire day on Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: A1GP 汽車大獎賽紐西蘭隊副駕駛強尼瑞德，今天合法地創下了最快速駕駛通過 48 年歷史的紐西蘭奧克蘭海灣大橋的紀錄。 里德先生駕駛紐西蘭的 A1GP 汽車「黑美人」，以時速超過 160 公里成功過橋七次。 因為黑美人車身太低，紐西蘭警方未能使用測速槍測得瑞德的車速，直到車速降至時速 160 公里，警察才成功測得一次。
mt: A1GP car race driver Johnny Reid broke the record for the fastest legal drive across the Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand's history today. Mr Reid drove the New Zealand A1GP car "Black Beauty" across the bridge seven times at speeds over 160 km/h. The Black Beauty car is too low for the New Zealand police to use a speed gun to measure Reid's speed, until the speed dropped to 160 km/h, the police were able to measure once.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

mt: 10:08 p.m. Monday, a magnitude 4.0 earthquake occurred in Montana. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the United States Geological Survey (USGS) did not receive any immediate disaster reports. The epicenter was located about 20 kilometers (15 miles) north of Dillon and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: 由於比什凱克的街道上並沒有出現執法員警，根據報告，大規模的搶劫活動一整晚都在持續發生。 一位觀察家將比斯凱克描述為陷入「無政府狀態」，因為成群的人們在街上遊蕩，搶劫零售商店。 幾名比斯凱克居民譴責來自南方的抗議人士違法亂紀。
mt: Because police were not seen on the streets of Bishkek, according to reports, large-scale looting continued throughout the night. One observer described Bishkek as being in a state of "anarchy," as groups of people roamed the streets and looted retail stores. Several Bishkek residents blamed the looting on protesters from the south.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. src: 這部美國公共電視臺 (PBS) 出品的節目獲得超過 24 座艾美獎，播出時間僅次於《芝麻街》和《羅傑斯先生的鄰居》。 節目的每一集將專注在一本特定書籍中的某個主題上，並接著藉由多個故事來探索該主題。 每集節目也將為孩子們去圖書館時應該找的書提供建議。 來自水牛城 WNED 電台（閱讀彩虹的母台）的約翰·格蘭特表示，「閱讀彩虹教導孩子們為何要閱讀，......熱愛閱讀。[該節目]鼓勵孩子們拿起書本開始閱讀。」 包括約翰葛蘭特在內的一些人認為，財政困難及電視教育節目理念的改變，促使此系列畫下句點。
mt: The PBS series won 24 Emmys, second only to Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focuses on a particular book and explores the topic through multiple stories. The series also offers suggestions for books children should look for in the library. John Grant of WNED in Buffalo, N.Y. (the Reading Rainbow home station), said, "Reading Rainbow teaches children why they should read,... love to read. [The series] encourages children to pick up a book and read." Some people, including John Grant, believe the financial difficulties and changes in the concept of television education led to the series' end.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: 動物解放組織和英國皇家防止虐待動物協會 (RSPCA) 再次呼籲，所有澳洲屠宰場中都要強制安裝閉路電視攝影機。 RSPCA 新南威爾斯州首席檢查員大衛‧歐山納西向 ABC 表示，澳洲應普遍執行對屠宰場的監控和與檢查。 「監視器一定會向這些養殖工作者傳達一個強烈訊息，也就是動物的福利是重中之重。」
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for all Australian abattoirs to be fitted with CCTV cameras. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Sullivan told ABC that Australia should implement widespread monitoring and inspection of abattoirs. "The cameras will send a strong message to these producers that animal welfare is paramount," he said.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: 今天於紅湖社區一帶流傳的消息為由於又有一名涉嫌 3 月 21 日校園槍擊案的學生被捕，因此傑夫·魏斯與九名受害者當中其三的葬禮暫停舉行。 當局除了確認今日的逮捕行動之外，透露甚少訊息。 然而，有關此調查的可靠消息來源向明尼蘇達州的《明星論壇報》透露，那其實是路易·喬丹，他是紅湖部落酋長弗洛伊德·喬丹的 16 歲兒子。 目前尚不知道會提出什麼樣的指控，或使有關當局找上那名男孩的原因，但聯邦法院已開始進行少年訴訟程序。
mt: Today, rumors are circulating in the Red Lake area that the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims of the March 21 school shooting has been postponed because another student has been arrested. Authorities have confirmed the arrest, but have revealed little else. However, a reliable source of information on the investigation told the Star Tribune of Minnesota that the student is Louis Jordan, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake tribal chief Floyd Jordan. It is not known what charges will be filed or why authorities have gone after the boy, but the federal court has begun a juvenile proceeding.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: 抗議活動的組織者表示，柏林、科隆、漢堡和漢諾威等德國城市約有 10 萬人參與。 據警方估計，柏林約有 6,500 名抗議者。 抗議活動還發生在巴黎、保加利亞的索菲亞、立陶宛的維爾紐斯、馬爾他的法勒他、愛沙尼亞的塔林以及蘇格蘭的愛丁堡和格拉斯哥等城市。 在倫敦，大約有 200 位民眾在部份版權持有商的辦公室外抗議。 波蘭在上個月簽署了反仿冒貿易協定，並在國內引發大型抗議，導致波蘭政府決定暫不批准該協議。 拉脫維亞及斯洛伐克都推遲加入反仿冒貿易協定的程序。
mt: 10,000 people in Germany's Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover took part in the protests, according to organizers. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Falteta, Malta, Tallinn, Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow, Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside offices of some copyright holders. Poland signed the anti-counterfeiting trade agreement last month, sparking large protests that led the government to decide not to ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have delayed joining the anti-counterfeiting trade agreement.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

mt: 60 cases of iPod overheating have been reported, resulting in 6 fires and 4 minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) has been informed of 27 of these incidents. ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: 澳洲通訊及媒體局 (ACMA) 也發現，雖然影片在網路上流傳，《老大哥》節目卻沒有違反線上內容審查法，因為影片並非儲存在《老大哥》的網站上。 《廣播服務法》提供網際網路內容的監管規則，然而若要被視為網際網路內容，必須實體上存在於伺服器上。
mt: The Australian Communications and Media Authority (ACMA) also found that, although the video was circulating online, the Big Brother program did not violate the Online Content Regulation Act, because the video was not stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides rules for monitoring Internet content, but in order to be considered Internet content, it must exist physically on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: 澳洲財政部長彼德‧寇斯特洛，同時也是最可能接任約翰‧霍華德總理成為自由黨主席的人選，表示支持澳洲核能產業。 科斯特洛部長表示，一旦經濟方面可行，澳洲應使用核能發電。 「一旦它能夠商業化，我們就應該要擁有。也就是說，對核能發電並沒有原則上的反對，」卡斯特洛先生說。
mt: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello, who is also the leading candidate to replace John Howard as Liberal Party leader, said he supports the Australian nuclear industry. Costello said that if it is economically feasible, Australia should use nuclear power. "If it can be commercialized, we should have it," Costello said. "There is no principled opposition to nuclear power."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: 由於一天只頒發 18 面獎牌，許多國家都無法站上領獎台。 其中包含在昨天的女子站姿滑雪超大曲道比賽中獲得第九名之荷蘭選手安娜‧約赫姆森，以及同一賽事裡第十名的芬蘭選手卡蒂亞·薩利寧。 澳洲的米切爾‧古爾利 (Mitchell Gourley) 在男子站姿超級大迴轉排名第十一。來自捷克的競爭對手奧德里奇·耶利內克 (Oldrich Jelinek) 則在男子坐姿超級大迴轉項目排名第十六名。 墨西哥的阿利·貝拉斯克斯在男子坐式超大曲道競賽排名第 15 位。紐西蘭的亞當·霍爾在男子站式超大曲道競賽排名第 9 位。 波蘭男子視障滑雪選手麥傑·克雷澤和領滑員安娜·奧加辛斯卡在超級大迴轉中獲得第 13 名。南韓朴宗石在男子坐式超級大迴轉中獲得第 24 名。
mt: 18 medals were awarded in one day, so many countries were unable to stand on the podium. Among them were the Netherlands' Anna Jochemsen, who finished ninth in the women's standing super-G slalom, and Finland's Katia Salonen, who finished tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished 11th in the men's standing super-G slalom. Oldrich Jelinek of the Czech Republic finished 16th in the men's sitting super-G slalom. Mexico's Ali Belarosa finished 15th in the men's sitting super-G slalom. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's standing super-G slalom. Poland's Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogrodzka finished 13th in the men's visually impaired super-G slalom. South Korea's Park Jong-Su finished 24th in the men's sitting super-G slalom.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: 峇里島議程中其他主題包括拯救世界上剩餘的森林，以及分享技術，幫助開發中國家以較不汙染環境的方式發展。 聯合國也希望敲定一筆經費，幫助受全球暖化影響的國家解決衍生問題。 這筆錢可用於防洪房屋、更佳的水資源管理和農作物多樣化。
mt: Other topics on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests and sharing technology to help developing countries develop in a less-polluting way. src: 奈及利亞此前宣布，計畫在峰會舉行前一周加入非洲大陸自由貿易區協定 (AfCFTA)。 非洲聯盟貿易及工業處長阿爾伯特·穆昌加 (Albert Muchanga) 宣布貝南共和國即將加入。 該委員表示：「我們尚未在原產地規則和關稅減讓上取得協議， 但我們所建立的架構已足以讓我們在 2020 年 7 月 1 日開始進行交易」。
mt: Nigeria announced earlier this week that it plans to join the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) before the summit. Albert Muchanga, the head of the African Union Trade and Industry Commission, announced that Benin will join. "We have not yet reached agreement on rules of origin and tariff reductions, but the framework we have established is sufficient to start trading on July 1, 2020," the commission said.
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. src: 她在亞特蘭大服務期間獲得高度評價，並因創新的城市教育受到肯定。 她於 2009 年獲頒年度國家教育局長的頭銜。 在她獲此殊榮之時，亞特蘭大的學校在考試成績上已有大幅提升。 不久之後，亞特蘭大憲法報發布了一份報告，指出測試結果存在問題。 此報告顯示測驗分數進步速度之快令人難以置信，並指出學校有進行內部調查，但並未對結果採許行動。 此後，有證據顯示試卷經過竄改。霍爾與其他 34 名教育官員在 2013 年被起訴。
mt: She was highly praised during her tenure in Atlanta and recognized for innovative city education. She was awarded the title of National Education Laboratory Director in 2009. At the time she received the honor, Atlanta's schools had made significant gains in test scores. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that showed the test results were questionable. The report showed the progress in test scores was too fast and that the schools had conducted an internal investigation but did not take any action on the results. It was later revealed that the tests had been tampered with. Hall and 34 other education officials were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

mt: A bomb exploded outside the office of the local governor. Three more bombs exploded in the vicinity of the government building within two hours. ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 兩顆人造衛星重量都超過一千磅，並以每小時 17,500 英里左右的速度移動。它們在地球上方 491 英里處相撞。 科學家說相撞造成的爆炸力道非常可觀。 他們仍在試著判斷撞擊的規模以及對地球的影響。 美國國防部戰略司令部正在追蹤殘骸。 分析圖將公佈在一個公開網站上。
mt: Two satellites weighing more than 1,000 pounds each were moving at about 17,500 miles per hour when they collided. They collided at an altitude of 491 miles above Earth. Scientists say the impact was significant. They are still trying to determine the scope of the collision and its impact on Earth. The U.S. Strategic Command is tracking the debris. An analysis graphic will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: 在周二與新民主黨領導人傑克‧林頓於總理辦公室進行 25 分鐘會晤後，總理史蒂芬‧哈珀同意將政府的《空氣潔淨法》送交由所有黨派組成的委員會審核，再進行二讀。 雷頓在與總理的會面中，請求修改保守黨的環境法案，要求「全面徹底改寫」保守黨所提的環境法案。 默西醫院位於塔斯馬尼亞州德文波特，自從聯邦政府介入接管該醫院的資助事宜，州政府及部分聯邦議會成員即批評該舉係為 11 月聯邦選舉序幕的噱頭。 但總理約翰·霍華德表示，該法案只是為了保護醫院的設施不被塔斯馬尼亞政府降級，為此撥出額外的 4,500 萬澳幣。
mt: 1. Harper agrees to send clean air bill to all-party committee for review. 2. Tasmanian hospital takeover criticized as election stunt. 3. Howard defends Tasmanian hospital takeover.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: 食用受污染的寵物食品後死亡的寵物，在牠們的尿液樣本中都發現了三聚氰酸和三聚氰胺。 貴湖大學的研究員表示，兩種化合物會互相反應，產生阻礙腎功能的結晶。 研究人員在貓尿中加入三聚氰胺和三聚氰酸，並觀察其中形成的結晶。 透過紅外光譜術 (FTIR) 進行比較時顯示，這些晶體的組成與受害寵物的尿液中發現的晶體相符。

src: 新華社報導，政府調查人員於週三找回了兩個「黑盒子」飛行記錄器。 摔角選手們也向露娜致敬。 湯米·卓門曾說：「露娜是第一位極限女王。我的第一位經理。露娜在雙月之夜去世，非常特別，就像她本人一樣。堅強的女人。」 知名摔角手「金粉」達斯汀·讓尼爾斯 (Dustin Runnels) 評論說：「盧納和我一樣怪異…或許甚至比我還要怪異…我愛她，並且會想念她……希望她去了一個更好的地方。」

src: 雖然車輛撞到房屋時有三人正在屋內，但無人受傷。 然而，那名司機的頭部受到了嚴重的傷害。 緊急救難人員將駕駛員從紅色奧迪 TT 中救出來時，發生車禍的路段暫時封閉。 一開始，他被收治到大雅茅斯 (Great Yarmouth) 的詹姆斯·佩吉特醫院 (James Paget Hospital)。 後來，他被轉往劍橋的阿登布魯克醫院 (Addenbrooke's Hospital) 。
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed into it, but no one was injured. However, the driver sustained serious head injuries. Emergency services closed the road while the driver was removed from the red Audi TT. He was initially taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth, but later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: 比賽於上午十點整開始，天氣很好，早晨的細雨也很快就停了，堪稱七人制橄欖球的完美比賽日。 賽事頭號種子南非隊開賽非常順利，以 26 比 0 輕鬆取勝第五種子尚比亞隊。 雖然在比賽中與南方姊妹們相比確實生疏了些，但隨著比賽的進行，南非隊很穩定地在進步。 他們靠著有紀律的防守、控球技巧與絕佳的團隊默契脫穎而出，顯然是不好對付的強隊。
mt: The match started at 10 am, the weather was good, and the morning drizzle stopped quickly, a perfect day for seven-a-side rugby. The top seed South Africa team started the game very smoothly, beating the fifth seed Zambia team 26-0. Although the game was not as smooth as the game against the South African sisters, the South African team was very stable and improved as the game progressed. They relied on disciplined defense, ball control skills, and excellent team cohesion to escape, obviously a tough team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: 過去三十年中，儘管中國官方仍宣稱他們是共產主義國家，但卻已發展出市場經濟。 首次經濟改革是在鄧小平的帶領之下進行。 自此之後，中國的經濟規模成長了 90 倍。 去年中國汽車的出口量首次超越德國，也超越美國成為該產業最大的市場。 中國的 GDP 在 20 年之內就可能超過美國。
mt: 30 years ago, although the Chinese government still claimed to be a communist country, it has developed a market economy. The first economic reform was led by Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 times. Last year, China's car exports exceeded Germany for the first time, surpassing the United States to become the largest market in the industry. China's GDP may surpass the United States in 20 years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: 胡錦濤表示：「我們將致力於 2020 年以前，大幅降低 2005 年的單位國內生產毛額每個單位的溫室氣體排放量水準。」 他沒有設定減少的數量，只聲稱將依據中國的經濟產出進行削減。 胡錦濤鼓勵發展中的國家「避免先汙染、後清理的老路」。 他補充道：「然而，不應該要求他們承擔超出其發展階段、責任和能力的義務。」
mt: Hu Jintao said, "We will endeavor to significantly reduce the level of greenhouse gas emissions per unit of gross domestic product by 2020, compared with the 2005 level." He did not set a specific reduction amount, only saying that it would be done in accordance with China's economic output. Hu Jintao encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later." He added, "However, they should not be asked to take on obligations beyond their development stage, responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: 雷歐諾夫，又名「11 號太空人」，是蘇聯最早的太空飛行員團隊成員。 1965 年 3 月 18 日，他執行首次太空載具外活動 (EVA) ，或稱「太空漫步」，獨自待在太空船外剛好超過 12 分鐘。 他因此成就得到蘇聯最高榮譽「蘇聯英雄」的稱號。 10 年後，他帶領阿波羅-聯盟測試計劃中的蘇聯部份，象徵了太空競賽的結束。
mt: Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11," was a member of the Soviet Union's first team of spaceflight pioneers. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk," alone outside a spacecraft for just over 12 minutes. He was awarded the Soviet Union's highest honor, "Hero of the Soviet Union," for the achievement. Ten years later, he led the Soviet portion of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, symbolizing the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: 目前所做的研究主要都是理論上的，但此計畫的目的在於模擬對人馬座星系所做的觀察。 該團隊想觀察到的效應，是由此星系與銀河各自之暗物質交互影響潮汐的結果 正如同月亮對地球的引力造成潮汐一樣，銀河系也對射手座星系施加了作用力。 科學家能斷定暗物質用與一般物質相同的方式影響其他暗物質。 該理論聲稱一個銀河系周圍的暗物質大多會形成一種暈圈，且是由許多微粒所組成。
mt: The research is mostly theoretical, but the goal of this project is to simulate observations of the Andromeda galaxy. The team wants to observe the effect of the tidal interaction between the dark matter of the Milky Way and the Andromeda galaxy. Just as the moon's gravity causes tides on Earth, the galaxy also exerts a force on the Andromeda galaxy. Scientists can determine that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as ordinary matter. The theory claims that most of the dark matter in a galaxy is in a halo and is made up of many particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

mt: After Hurricane Katrina, controversy over relief and rebuilding costs sparked discussion; some fiscal conservatives humorously called it "Bush's New Orleans deal." The left criticized the rebuilding contracts for rewarding what they considered to be Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: 當太空艙在大約凌晨 5 點 (美東時間) 抵達地球並進入大氣層時，預計將會為北加州、奧瑞岡州、內華達州和猶他州居民上演一場精采燈光秀。 太空艙會像流星一樣劃過天際。 太空艙以每秒 12.8 公里或 8 英里的速率前進，這個速度足以在一分鐘內從舊金山抵達洛杉磯。 星塵號將是最快返回地球的太空船並因而創下新的歷史紀錄，打破 1969 年 5 月阿波羅 10 號指揮艙返航時所創的舊紀錄。 Stardust 專案經理湯姆．達克斯伯里 (Tom Duxbury) 表示：「它將飛越北加州的西海岸，照亮從加州到俄勒岡州中部，再經由內華達州及愛達荷州直到猶他州的天空。」
mt: 5 a.m. EST (1000 GMT) when the capsule is expected to re-enter the atmosphere and streak across the skies of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will be traveling at 12.8 kilometers per second or 8 miles per second, fast enough to get from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will be the fastest returning spacecraft and set a new record, breaking the old record set by the Apollo 10 command module in May 1969. "It will fly over the West Coast of California, light up the skies from California to the middle of Oregon, through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah," Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury said.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: 俄亥俄州有關當局週三表示，一名在賓州匹玆堡兒童醫院工作的醫師，在被發現她母親死於她後車箱中後，將被控加重謀殺罪。 29 歲的馬拉·巴拉蘇布拉曼尼安 (Malar Balasubramanian) 醫生在俄亥俄州的布魯艾施（辛辛那提以北約 15 英里的郊區）被發現，她穿著 T 恤和內衣躺在路邊的地上，顯然攝入了大量的藥物。 她指引警官前往 500 英尺外的黑色奧茲摩比 Intrigue 轎車。 他們在那裏發現了薩羅雅·巴拉蘇布拉馬尼安的遺體，53 歲的她身上蓋著沾了血跡的毯子。 警方說，屍體看起來已擺在那裡 1 天左右。
mt: 29-year-old Malar Balasubramanian, a doctor working at the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, will be charged with aggravated murder after she was found with her mother's body in the trunk of her car. In Ohio, police found Balasubramanian lying on the side of the road in a T-shirt and underwear, apparently having taken a large amount of drugs. She directed police to a black 2007 Ozmo Bi Intrigue sedan 500 feet away. They found the body of Saroj Balasubramanian, 53, who was covered with a bloodstained blanket. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. src: 傷員送往醫院後，打鬥停止，這時剩下的囚犯中約有 40 人留在庭院中，拒絕回去自己的牢房。 談判者嘗試矯正當時的狀況，但囚犯們的需求並不明確。 北美山區時間下午 10:00 至 11:00 間，囚犯在庭院中縱火。 全副武裝的鎮暴警察很快就進入院子，並利用催淚瓦斯把犯人逼到死角。 消防隊最後在晚間 11:35 撲滅火勢。
mt: 40 inmates remained in the yard after the fight stopped and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to correct the situation, but the inmates' demands were unclear. At 10:00 pm to 11:00 pm, inmates set fire to the yard. Armed riot police soon entered the yard and used tear gas to force the inmates into a corner. Firefighters finally extinguished the fire at 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: 在電視上直播的評論中，伊朗高層消息來源首次承認制裁有產生影響。 其中包含了金融限制，以及禁止原油出口至歐盟，後者佔伊朗經濟中國外收益的 80%。 在最近一期的月報中，石油輸出國組織表示原油的出口降到了 20 年來的新低，一天只有 280 萬桶。 該國最高領袖大阿亞圖拉賽義德阿里·哈米尼曾形容，對石油的依賴是一個早在 1979 年伊朗伊斯蘭革命之前就出現的「陷阱」，而伊朗應該從中解放出來。
mt: In a televised interview, a senior Iranian official acknowledged for the first time that sanctions have had an impact. This includes financial restrictions and a ban on oil exports to the European Union, which accounts for 80 percent of Iran's foreign exchange earnings. In its latest monthly report, the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries said oil exports had fallen to a new low in 20 years, to 2.8 million barrels a day. Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described dependence on oil as a "trap" that existed before the 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution, and that Iran should be freed from it.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: 在法國，投票傳統上是個低技術的經驗：投票者獨自在投票亭內，將事先印妥表明投票對象的選票放入信封中。 經官方人員確認選民的身份後，選民再將信封放入投票箱，並在投票單上簽名。 法國選舉法中十分嚴謹地編纂了投票程序。 自 1988 年起，投票箱必須是透明的，以讓選民和觀察員可以見證投票開始時箱內沒有信封，並且除了經過授權且確實計數的選民投入的信封，沒有另外投入信封。 候選人能派遣代表見證流程的每一部分。在晚間，志工在嚴格監督之下遵循特定程序計票。
mt: In France, voting is traditionally a low-tech experience: voters are alone in a voting booth, putting pre-printed ballots indicating their vote into a sealed envelope. After official personnel confirm the voter's identity, the voter then puts the envelope into a ballot box and signs a voting slip. The voting process is meticulously detailed in French election law. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent, so that voters and observers can see that no envelopes are in the box at the start of voting, and that only envelopes put in by authorized and actually counted voters are in the box. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. At night, volunteers count the ballots under strict supervision, following a specific procedure.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: 東尼·摩爾醫師 (Tony Moll) 在南非誇祖魯-納塔爾省發現了極具抗藥性的結核病（XDR-TB）。 他在一次訪問中表示，新的變異株「有極高的致死率，因此非常令人不安和恐慌」。 莫爾醫生認為有些病人可能是在醫院中感染上病菌，且至少有兩個病例為醫護人員。 一名受感染者在一年內可能會感染 10 到 15 名親密接觸者。 然而，在整體結核病患者群當中，罹患廣泛抗藥性結核菌者，比率似乎仍非常低；在南非，任何特定時刻中，每 33 萬人有 6 千人受到感染。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province. He said in an interview that the new strain "has a very high mortality rate, so it's very alarming and scary." Moll believes some patients may have contracted the bacteria in the hospital, and at least two cases were health care workers. One infected person could infect 10 to 15 close contacts in a year. However, the rate of XDR-TB patients in the general tuberculosis population seems to be very low; in South Africa, there are 6,000 cases per 33 million people at any given time.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen 是一種美國聯邦航空總署宣稱可讓飛機縮短飛行路徑的系統，每年能夠節省上百萬加侖的燃料，並大幅削減碳排放。 它使用基於衛星的技術，而基於地面雷達的舊技術，來讓空中交通管制員更精準地定位飛機，並為飛行員提供更準確的資訊。
mt: NextGen is a system that the Federal Aviation Administration claims will allow planes to fly shorter routes, saving millions of gallons of fuel and reducing carbon emissions each year. It uses satellite-based technology, rather than the ground-based radar technology of the old system, to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint planes more precisely and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: JAS 39C 獅鷲戰鬥機在當地時間上午 9 點 30 分（世界協調時間 02:30）墜落在跑道上並爆炸，導致機場暫停商業航班的起降。 駕駛員的身分確認是空軍少校帕塔維 (Dilokrit Pattavee)。 當地媒體報導一輛機場消防車在出勤時翻覆。

src: 整個 1960 年代，布里辛斯基擔任過約翰．甘迺迪的顧問及林登．詹森的幕僚。 1976 年的選舉中，他對卡特的外交政策提出建議，其後在 1977 至 1981 年間，接替亨利·季辛吉擔任國家安全顧問 (NSA)。 作為美國國家安全局的一員，他在外交上協助卡特處理世界事務，例如 1978 年的大衛營協議；1970 年代後期為美中關係正常化出謀劃策；1979 年引發伊朗人質危機的伊朗革命；和 1979 年蘇聯入侵阿富汗。
mt: 1960s, he served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and staff member to Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 election, he advised Jimmy Carter on foreign policy, and from 1977 to 1981, he succeeded Henry Kissinger as National Security Advisor. ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. src: 波貝克出生於克羅埃西亞的首都薩格勒布，在為貝爾格萊德游擊隊效力時成名。 他在 1945 年加入該隊，並一直待到 1958 年。 他在該隊期間，共計出賽 468 次，獲得 403 分。 博貝克在球隊中的出場數與進球數居冠。 1995 年，他獲選為游擊隊足球俱樂部的史上最佳球員。
mt: Born in Zagreb, Croatia, Bobek made his name playing for the Belgrade Partizan. He joined the team in 1945 and stayed until 1958. He played 468 games for the team, scoring 403 goals. Bobek led the team in both appearances and goals scored. In 1995, he was named the best player in the club's history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: 伊氏西爪龍屬於馳龍科，是迅猛龍的近親。 這種全身覆蓋羽毛、溫血的猛禽據信已能以帶爪的雙腳直立行走，像迅猛龍一樣。 牠的第二隻爪比較大，使牠獲得西爪龍的封號，意指「西方之爪」。
mt: The Iberomesornis was a member of the Dromaeosauridae, a close relative of the Velociraptor. It is believed to have been warm-blooded and covered in feathers, and to have been able to stand upright on its hind legs, like the Velociraptor. Its second toe was larger than the others, giving it the name Iberomesornis, meaning "Western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: 為了慶祝去年舉行婚禮的伴侶結婚滿一週年，至少有 100 位民眾參加了派對。 官員們表示，原訂於幾日之後舉辦正式的週年紀念活動。 這對夫妻在一年前於德州結婚，當時是到水牛城與親友慶祝。 那名 30 歲、生於水牛城的丈夫，是在槍擊案中被殺的四名死者之一，但她的妻子並未受傷。
mt: 100 people attended a party to celebrate the one-year anniversary of a couple who got married last year. Officials say a formal anniversary event is scheduled for a few days later. The couple married in Texas last year and celebrated with friends in Buffalo. The 30-year-old Buffalo native was one of four people killed in a shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: 魯諾號拋錨時，船上有 120 到 160 立方公尺的燃料，狂風和巨浪將船推進了防波堤。 直升機救出了十二名船員，只有一人鼻骨骨折。 那艘 100 公尺的輪船正在前往運載一批其經常運載的肥料途中，而主管人員原本害怕它會灑出許多。
mt: 120 to 160 cubic meters of fuel was on board when the ship ran aground, and wind and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued twelve crew members, one with a broken nose. The 100-meter ship was on its way to carry a batch of its usual fertilizer, and officials were afraid it would spill a lot.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

mt: Walter's achievements outside of his work as a director include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he called political censorship. French law was changed. His social history began when he was fifteen during World War II when he joined the French Resistance. He wrote a book in 1998 about his life. He returned to independent Algeria in the 1960s to teach film directors.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. src: 超過四百萬人到羅馬參加葬禮。 出席人數眾多，因此不是每個人都能進入聖伯多祿廣場參加葬禮。 羅馬各處架設了幾面巨型電視螢幕，讓人民觀看儀式。 許多義大利城市和世界上其他地方也有類似的陳設，尤其是波蘭，並有為數眾多的人潮前來觀禮。
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. The large number of attendees meant not everyone could fit into St. Peter's Square for the funeral. Large screens were set up in Rome and other Italian cities, as well as in other parts of the world, especially Poland, where large crowds gathered to watch the ceremony.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 根據報導，馬克白街上的一棟公寓因瓦斯外洩而爆炸。 在鄰居打電話通報瓦斯洩漏之後，一名瓦斯公司人員隨即到場勘查。 該主管到場時，公寓已發生爆炸。 無任何重大傷亡匯報，但爆炸發生時，現場至少有五人因產生休克症狀而接受治療。 公寓內沒有任何人。 當時，從該地區撤離了將近 100 位居民。
mt: According to reports, a blast occurred in a building on Markby Street after a gas leak.  A gas company employee arrived on the scene after a neighbor called to report a gas leak.  The manager arrived on the scene after the building had exploded.  No major injuries were reported, but at least five people were treated for shock symptoms when the blast occurred.  No one was in the building at the time.  About 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: 死者為 25 歲的尼可拉斯．阿爾登 (Nicholas Alden) 和 21 歲的札克利．庫德巴克 Zachary Cuddeback 。庫德巴克是巴士的駕駛。 埃德加·維古拉 (Edgar Veguilla) 的手臂和下顎受傷，而克里斯托弗·施耐德 (Kristoffer Schneider) 則需要進行臉部重建手術。 烏卡瞄準第五個人的頭部時槍枝失靈。史耐德受傷造成長久性的疼痛、一隻眼睛失明、顱骨缺損，臉部必須以鈦金屬重建。 施耐德在家鄉的一處美國空軍基地視訊作證。
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback, who was driving the bus, were killed. Edgar Veguilla, 29, suffered a gunshot wound to the arm and jaw, and Kristoffer Schneider, 24, needed facial reconstructive surgery. The gun misfired when it was aimed at the fifth person's head. Schneider suffered long-term pain, lost an eye, and had a skull defect that required titanium reconstruction. Schneider testified via video from his home base at an American Air Force base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: 高爾夫球和英式橄欖球都將重返奧運會。 國際奧委會今日於柏林舉行的執行委員會會議中，投票決定將納入比賽的運動種類。英式橄欖球，精確來說是七人制橄欖球，以及高爾夫球，勝過其他五項運動，被列為奧運項目。 壁球、空手道和滑輪溜冰就像棒球與壘球，都試圖躋身奧運項目，但在 2005 年的投票表決中紛紛落選。 表決仍需在 10 月份的哥本哈根會議上經國際奧林匹克委員會全體委員批准。
mt: Golf and rugby sevens will return to the Olympics. The sports were voted in as Olympic events at the International Olympic Committee's executive board meeting in Berlin on Monday. Rugby sevens, the seven-a-side version of the game, and golf beat out five other sports in the vote.  Table tennis, taekwondo and roller skating were also in the running, but were voted down in 2005.  The vote still needs to be approved by the full IOC membership at a meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

mt: Golf and rugby sevens will return to the Olympics. The sports were voted in as Olympic events at the International Olympic Committee's executive board meeting in Berlin on Monday. Rugby sevens, the seven-a-side version of the game, and golf beat out five other sports in the vote.  Table tennis, taekwondo and roller skating were also in the running, but were voted down in 2005.  The vote still needs to be approved by the full IOC membership at a meeting in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 對人體有致命危險的禽流感病毒株 H5N1，已證實感染了一隻於週一在法國東部里昂附近沼澤地中發現的死野鴨。 隨著奧地利、德國、斯洛維尼亞、保加利亞、希臘，和義大利之後，法國是歐盟中第七個遭受這種病毒危害的國家。 克羅埃西亞和丹麥的 H5N1 疑似案例依然未被確認。
mt: A wild duck found dead near Lyon, France, on Monday has tested positive for the H5N1 strain of avian flu, which is known to be fatal to humans. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece, and Italy. Cases in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 2010 年發生地震後，抵達海地的聯合國維和部隊被認為是傳播該疾病的罪魁禍首，該疾病始於部隊的營地附近。 根據該起訴訟，聯合國營地的廢棄物未經適當消毒，導致海地最大河流之一阿蒂博尼特河的支流滋生細菌。 在部隊進駐前，海地自十八世紀以來從未發生過與霍亂有關的問題。 海地正義與民主組織參考了幾份獨立研究，這些研究認為尼泊爾聯合國維和部隊在不知情的情況下將該疾病帶入海地。 聯合國的疾病專家丹妮耶‧蘭特內表示，爆發很可能是由維和部隊造成的。
mt: 2010 earthquake, the United Nations peacekeeping forces to Haiti are believed to be the culprit of the spread of the disease, the disease began in the vicinity of the camp. According to the lawsuit, the United Nations camp waste was not properly disinfected, leading to the largest river in Haiti, one of the tributaries of the Atibonite River bacteria. Before the troops arrived, Haiti has never had a problem related to cholera since the 18th century. Haiti Justice and Democracy Organization referred to several independent research, these studies believe that the Nepalese United Nations peacekeeping forces unknowingly brought the disease into Haiti. United Nations disease expert Danielle Lantagne said the outbreak may have been caused by peacekeeping forces.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: 愛爾蘭政府強調議會立法改正此狀況的迫切性。 「就公衛和刑事司法的立場而言，現在最重要的是應盡快頒布法令」，一名政府發言人說道。 對於趁機利用相關物質的暫時合法性的個人之健康，以及自目前違憲變更生效後毒品相關犯罪的判決，衛生部長都表達了關切之意。
mt: The Irish government stressed the urgency of legislation to correct the situation. "From a public health and criminal justice perspective, the most important thing now is to get the legislation enacted as soon as possible," a government spokesman said. The health minister expressed concern about the personal health of those who would take advantage of the temporary legality of the substances and the convictions for drug-related crimes that would be overturned after the current unconstitutional change took effect.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: 范浩揚是眾人皆知但充滿爭議的英語補教老師，他曾任教於現代教育及英皇教育，自稱生涯顛峰期曾教過 9,000 名學生。 他在筆記中使用了某些家長視為髒話的字眼，據說他在課堂上也會講粗話。 現代教育補習社指控他謊稱自己為該社之首席英文老師，並在未獲授權的情況下在公車上刊登大型廣告。 他之前也被控侵犯版權，但沒有被起訴。 他以前的學生表示：「他在課堂上會用俚語，做筆記教我們約會技巧，他跟學生亦師亦友。」
mt: Van Hoang is a controversial English tutor who taught at Modern Education and English King. He claims to have taught 9,000 students at the peak of his career. He used some words in his notes that parents considered vulgar, and he reportedly used vulgar language in class. Modern Education Tutoring Center accused him of falsely claiming to be the company's chief English tutor and posting large advertisements on buses without authorization. He was previously charged with copyright infringement but was not prosecuted. His former students said, "He used slang in class, taught us dating skills in his notes, and was a friend to his students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: 一名前菲律賓員警在菲律賓的首都馬尼拉劫持香港觀光客的巴士，並把他們當作人質。 羅蘭多‧蒙多薩以 M16 步槍向遊客射擊。 目前已經救出幾名人質，並確認至少六人死亡。 他們先釋放了包括小孩與老人在內的六名人質，如同菲律賓籍的攝影師那樣。 兩名攝影師後來與一名需要如廁的老婦人交換。最後曼多薩被擊斃。
mt: A former Philippine police officer hijacked a bus full of Hong Kong tourists in Manila, holding them hostage. Rolando Mendoza fired an M16 rifle at the tourists. At least six people have been killed and several others injured. He first released six hostages, including children and elderly people, like the Filipino photographer. Two photographers later exchanged with an elderly woman who needed to use the bathroom. Mendoza was killed.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: 巴西是地球上最大的羅馬天主教國家，而羅馬天主教會一向反對同性婚姻在巴西合法化。 巴西國民議會已進行了 10 年的合法化辯論，但這樣的民事婚姻目前只有在南里約格蘭德合法。 原本的法案是由前聖保羅市長瑪爾塔‧蘇普利希起草的。草擬的法案經過修改後，現已交給羅伯托‧傑弗遜處理。 示威者希望能夠收集一百二十萬個連署簽名，在十一月提交給國會。
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in Brazil. The National Congress has been debating the legalization for ten years, but such civil marriage is only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former São Paulo mayor Marta Suplicy. The bill was modified and is now being handled by Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures to submit to Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: 表演剛開演五分鐘就突然捲起一陣狂風，大約一分鐘後風速就已高達每小時 70 公里…然後暴雨襲來，雨勢又急又大，打在皮膚上有如針刺，緊接著冰雹從天而降，人們驚惶尖叫，奔跑互踩。 我失去了我的姊妹和她的朋友，而我在逃跑途中，有兩名坐輪椅的身障人士，大家直接跳過他們和推擠他們。」阿曼．維薩切 (Armand Versace) 說。
mt: The performance had just begun when suddenly a fierce wind blew up, gusting up to 70 kilometers per hour in about a minute. Then the rain came down hard, stinging like needles, followed by hail. People panicked, screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and in the stampede, two disabled people in wheelchairs were trampled and shoved aside, said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: 氣象預報員說，這場颶風位於維德角島西方 645 英里（1040 公里）處，很有可能在威脅到陸地之前就消散掉。 弗雷德 (Fred) 目前風速為每小時 105 英里（165 公里／小時）並往西北方前進。 弗雷德是有衛星影像以來，大西洋東南方記錄上威力最強的熱帶颶風，卻還只 是 35°W 以東記錄上第三大颶風。
mt: The National Hurricane Center said the storm was 645 miles west of the Cape Verde Islands and was likely to dissipate before threatening land. Fred was moving west-northwest at 105 mph. Fred is the third strongest hurricane on record in the Atlantic east of 35 degrees west longitude, according to satellite imagery.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. src: 這位奧運金牌選手原本要參加大英國協運動會的 100 公尺和 200 公尺自由式比賽，以及三項游泳接力賽，但他的症狀卻讓人懷疑他的身體狀況。 他無法服用藥物來抑制疼痛，因為奧運會禁止使用那些藥物。
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist Ryan Lochte was originally scheduled to compete in the 100 and 200 meter freestyle events and three swimming relays at the Commonwealth Games, but his symptoms raised concerns about his physical condition. ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: 美國地質調查局的國際地震地圖顯示冰島過去一週都沒有發生地震。 冰島氣象局亦表示海克拉火山地區在過去 48 小時無地震活動。 引發狀態改變的明顯地震活動發生於 3 月 10 日，位置在火山頂端火山口的東北側。 有人說山腳下出現與任何火山活動皆無關的烏雲據。 眼前所見的雲可能造成混淆，不確定是否真的發生火山爆發。
mt: The United States Geological Survey's international earthquake map shows that Iceland has not had any earthquakes in the past week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also says there have been no earthquakes in the area around the volcano in the past 48 hours. The earthquake that triggered the change in status occurred on March 10, in the northeast of the volcano's crater. Some people say clouds at the foot of the mountain have nothing to do with any volcanic activity. The clouds in front of you may cause confusion and it is not certain whether a real volcanic eruption has occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: 無人月球軌道探測器月船 1 號彈出月球撞擊探測器 (MIP)，以每秒 1.5 公里（時速 3000 英里）的速度在月球表面飛馳，成功在月球南極點附近強行著陸。 除攜帶三項重要科學儀器外，印度月球探測器還在儀器各面彩繪，帶上印度國旗圖像。
mt: The Indian Moon Impact Probe (MIP) was ejected from the Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter, and flew to the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour), successfully landing near the lunar south pole. In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, the Indian lunar probe also had images of the Indian flag painted on the instruments' faces.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
