src: 本季該疾病的首個案例是在七月底上報的。 這種疾病存在於豬身上，然後透過蚊子傳播給人類。 疫情促使印度政府採取一些措施，比方在重災區部署捕豬隊、分發大量蚊帳以及噴灑殺蟲劑。 政府也承諾生產數百萬支腦炎疫苗，此舉將幫助衛生單位做好準備因應明年的疫情。 由於缺乏資金且相對其他疾病的優先順序較低，今年運送疫苗到史上受感染最嚴重地區的計劃因而延遲。
mt: The first case of the disease was reported in late July. The disease exists in pigs, and is then transmitted to humans by mosquitoes. The outbreak prompted the Indian government to take some measures, such as deploying pig-catching teams in affected areas, distributing millions of mosquito nets, and spraying insecticide. The government also promised to produce hundreds of millions of brain-disease vaccines, which will help health officials prepare for next year's outbreak. Due to lack of funds and relatively low priority compared to other diseases, the plan to send vaccines to the most affected areas in history was delayed.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: 憲法修正案之提案已在 2011 年由兩院通過。 本立法會期對該修正案進行修正，先經眾議院刪除第二條文，參議院再於本周一通過相似版本。 禁止同性民事結合的提議經第二次宣判失敗，有可能開啟未來同性民事結合之門。 經此程序之後，眾議院聯合決議 3 將在 2015 或 2016 年由下屆民選立法機構重新審查，以持續修法。
mt: 2011, the proposal was passed by both houses of the legislature. The current legislative session has amended the proposal, first deleting the second article by the House of Representatives, and then passed a similar version by the Senate on Monday. The proposal to ban same-sex civil unions was rejected for the second time, which may open the door for future same-sex civil unions. After this process, the House of Representatives will jointly resolve 3 to be re-examined by the next elected legislative body in 2015 or 2016.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: 「巴拿馬文件」統稱 2016 年春天，巴拿馬法律事務所莫薩克‧馮賽卡外洩給媒體的文件，約有一千萬份。 文件中指出 14 家銀行協助富有客戶藏匿了數十億美元的資產，以規避稅金與其他法規。 英國報紙《衛報》暗指，用於實現此目的的 1,200 間空殼公司裡，德意志銀行控制了大約三分之一。 此事件造成世界各地的抗議活動 、多起刑事訴訟，冰島及巴基斯坦的政府領導人也雙雙辭職。
mt: 14 banks helped wealthy clients hide billions in assets to avoid taxes and other regulations. The Guardian newspaper implied that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1,200 shell companies used to achieve this. The event caused protests in many countries, criminal charges, and the resignation of the leaders of Iceland and Pakistan.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: 伊朗因民用和軍用的飛機都年久失修，而空難事件頻仍。 國際制裁表示無法購入新飛機。 本週初，一架警用直升機墜毀，造成三個人死亡和另外三個人受傷。 伊朗在上個月發生了數年來最慘的一起空難，一架飛往亞美尼亞的班機墜毀，機上有 168 人罹難。 同一個月，在馬什哈德有另一架民航客機滑行衝出跑道、撞上一面牆、並造成十七人死亡。
mt: Iran has been plagued by frequent air disasters due to its aging civilian and military aircraft fleet, which has been unable to purchase new aircraft due to international sanctions. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crashed, killing three people and injuring three others. Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years last month when a flight to Armenia crashed, killing all 168 people on board. The same month, a civilian passenger plane in Mashhad veered off the runway, crashed into a wall, and killed 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: 伊拉克研究小組在今天格林威治標準時間 12 點提出報告。 它警告說，沒人能保證此時在伊拉克採取的任何行動方針將阻止宗派戰爭、持續成長的暴力或陷入混亂。 此報告開頭先請求美國針對中東政策進行公開辯論並形成共識。 此報告大力抨擊了行政機構現行對伊拉克政策的幾乎所有面向，並強烈主張立即改變方向。 在其中 78 個建議，第一個就是應在今年年底前採行新的外交措施，以保護伊拉克的邊境免受敵國侵擾，並重建與其鄰國的外交關係。
mt: 12:00 GMT, an Iraqi Study Group report was submitted. It warns that no one can guarantee that any policy taken in Iraq at this time will prevent sectarian war, continued violence, or chaos. The report begins by requesting that the United States hold a public debate and reach a consensus on its Middle East policy. The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the current administration's policy in Iraq and strongly advocates an immediate change of direction. Of the 78 recommendations, the first is to implement new diplomatic measures by the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from enemy incursion and to rebuild diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ansa 表示，警方憂心最猛烈的數起攻擊恐造成繼任之爭全面爆發。 警方說，洛·皮科洛之所以佔了上風是因為他在巴勒莫曾擔任普羅文察諾的左右手，較豐富的經驗為他贏得老一輩頭目的尊敬，他們依循普羅文察諾的方針，在強化權力網絡的同時，儘可能保持低調。 這些老大在普文札諾於 1992 年結束里納針對國家發動的衝突時已被控制住，該場衝突奪走了黑手黨改革鬥士喬凡尼‧法爾康 (Giovanni Falcone) 和保羅‧波賽里尼 (Paolo Borsellino) 的性命。
mt: Ansa reports that police are most concerned that the most violent attacks could spark a full-scale succession battle. Police say that Pecoraro is in the lead because he was the right-hand man of Provenzano in Palermo, and has more experience, which won the respect of the old bosses, who followed Provenzano's line of strengthening the power network while remaining as low-key as possible. These big men were controlled by Provenzano when he ended the Rina's conflict against the state in 1992, which took the lives of mafia reform fighters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino.
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: 日本柔道選手，也是兩屆奧運金牌得主，齊藤仁 (Hitoshi Saito) 去世，時年 54 歲。 公布的死因為肝內膽管癌。 本週二他在大阪辭世。 除了前奧運會和世界冠軍的身份之外，齋藤在去世前還擔任全日本柔道連盟培訓委員會的主席。
mt: 54-year-old Hitoshi Saito, a Japanese judo player and two-time Olympic gold medalist, died on Monday. The cause of death was liver cancer. He died in Osaka on Monday. In addition to his former Olympic and world champion status, Saito was also the chairman of the training committee of the All Japan Judo Federation before his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: 尚卡羅‧費希切拉無法控制車輛，使得比賽開始後不久就結束了。 他的隊友費爾南多·阿隆索在大部分的賽程都領先，但一離開維修站，他的賽事也跟著告終，大概是因為右前輪沒裝好。 麥可・舒馬克在阿隆索出局後不久，也因為在比賽中多次與對手競速，造成懸吊系統損壞而結束了比賽。
mt: 2007 Formula One World Championship leader Fernando Alonso was leading most of the race, but his race ended soon after leaving the pit lane, probably because his front right wheel was not properly installed. Michael Schumacher's race ended soon after Alonso's, when his suspension was damaged after several collisions with other cars.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: 在過去 3 個月裏，中央懲處中心釋放了超過 80 名被捕人士，他們都沒有被正式起訴。 今年四月，葛林法官針對監獄核發臨時禁制令，要求強制釋放在被捕後已拘留超過 24 小時但仍未收到法院通知預審的人。 如果獲得批准，法院助理法官會決定保釋金額，並正式受理執行逮捕之警員提出的指控。接下來這些指控會進入該州的電腦系統，藉以追蹤案件進度。 聽證會同時也確定了嫌疑犯獲得訊速審判的日期。
mt: 80 people were released by the Central Correctional Facility in the past three months without being formally charged. In April, Judge Glinton issued a temporary restraining order against the prison, requiring the release of those arrested after 24 hours of detention without receiving a court notice of a preliminary hearing. If approved, an assistant judge will determine the amount of bail and formally receive the charges brought by the arresting officer. These charges will then be entered into the state's computer system to track the progress of the case. The hearing also determined the date of the speedy trial for the suspect.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: 自 1947 年脫離英國統治獨立後，巴基斯坦總統會任命「政治代理人」來管理聯邦直轄部落地區，後者對於這些地區幾乎有完全的自治權。 根據巴基斯坦憲法第 247 條，這些官員需負責治理與提供司法服務。
mt: Since its independence from British rule in 1947, the president of Pakistan has appointed "political agents" to govern the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, who have nearly complete autonomy over these regions.  According to the Pakistani constitution, Article 247, these officials are responsible for governing and providing judicial services.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: 這部電影由雷恩·葛斯林和艾瑪·史東主演，並獲得所有主要獎項的提名。 雷恩‧葛斯林和艾瑪‧史東分別獲提名為最佳男主角和最佳女主角。 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳導演、最佳攝影、最佳服裝設計、最佳剪輯、最佳原創音樂、最佳製作設計、最佳音效剪輯、最佳混音及最佳原著劇本獎。 電影中的兩首歌曲〈Audition (The Fools Who Dream)〉和〈 City of Stars〉提名最佳原創歌曲。獅門影視總共提名 26 個獎項，傲視其他電影工作室。

ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. src: NHK 也報導，位於新潟縣的柏崎刈羽核能發電廠當時運作正常。 北陸電力回報未受地震影響，且志賀核能發電廠的一號和二號反應爐也關閉了。 根據報導，在此地區約有 9400 戶民宅斷水，100 戶民宅斷電。 部分道路已受損，受災地區的鐵路服務中斷，而石川縣的能登機場依舊關閉。
mt: NHK also reports that the Onagawa Nuclear Power Plant in Miyagi Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported no impact from the quake, and the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Shika Nuclear Power Plant were shut down. According to the report, about 9,400 households in the area were without water, and 100 households were without electricity. Some roads were damaged, and rail service was suspended in the affected area, while the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.

The document is said to include other topics such as the future of the holy city of Jerusalem, which is shared by both countries, and the Jordan Valley issue.  Israel requires that if the agreement is signed, it will continue to have troops in the Jordan Valley for ten years, while the Palestinian self-government agrees to keep troops for only five years.

During the election, Tsai Ing-wen hinted that Ma Ying-jeou might flee the country in times of crisis.  Tsai Ing-wen also stated that Ma Ying-jeou was only a "paper tiger."  Despite these accusations, Ma Ying-jeou easily won with a platform of closer ties with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: 在許多抗拒驅逐令的家庭尋求法律援助一事浮上檯面後，東灣社區法律中心遂於 3 月 20 日為住所詐騙案的受害者辦了一場公聽會。 當房客開始分享自己所遭遇的狀況，多數捲入事件的家庭突然意識到，奧克蘭房屋委員會的 Carolyn Wilson 偷走他們的保證金並已捲款潛逃。 洛克伍德花園中的房客相信，可能還有 40 個或更多家庭將被逐出，因為他們明白奧克蘭住宅管理局的警察也在調查其他可能遭受住宅欺詐的奧克蘭公共住宅。
mt: After the issue of evictions came to light, the East Bay Community Law Center held a public hearing on March 20 for victims of the scam. When tenants began sharing their experiences, many of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the Oakland Housing Authority had stolen their deposits and fled with the money. Tenants in the Rockridge neighborhood believe that there may be 40 or more families who will be evicted, as they realize that the Oakland Housing Authority police are also investigating other possible victims of housing fraud in Oakland public housing.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: 比賽結束後，凱瑟洛夫斯基以 2,250 的積分保持車手排行榜的領先地位。 強森獲得 2,243 分，以七分之差的成績屈居第二。 第三名漢姆林落後 20 分，但領先波伊爾 5 分。卡恩和小楚克斯分別以 2220 分和 2207 分位居第五和第六名。 在賽季仍剩四場賽事的情況下，史都華、戈登、肯瑟斯和哈維克分佔了車手冠軍排行榜的前十名。
mt: 2010 Formula One season champion Sebastian Vettel won the 2011 Brazilian Grand Prix, his second victory of the season. Vettel's teammate Mark Webber finished second, and Red Bull Racing teammate Sebastian Vettel finished third. The race was won under the safety car, after a crash involving Jenson Button and Vitaly Petrov. The race was also marred by a crash involving Jaime Alguersuari and Jarno Trulli, which resulted in Trulli's retirement. The race was also the last for the 2010 champion Fernando Alonso, who finished in 12th place.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: 據信這是史上第五次人類發現並經由化學方式證明有火星物質掉落到地球上。 地球上將近兩萬四千顆已知的隕石中，只有 34 顆確定來自火星。 其中十五顆岩石來自去年七月的流星雨。 有些地球上非常少見的石頭以每盎司 11,000 到 22,500 美元的價格販售，約是黃金價格的 10 倍。
mt: This is the fifth time that humans have discovered and chemically proven that Martian material has fallen to Earth. Of the nearly 24,000 known meteorites on Earth, only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Fifteen of the rocks are from the meteor shower in July last year. Some of the Earth's rare stones are sold at prices of $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, about 10 times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

mt: 7-time Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who was supposed to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured, was scheduled to race. The Brazilian was injured in a crash at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix, suffering severe head trauma. As a result, Massa will miss the remaining races of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: 直至現在，由於美國境內的廣泛使用，AOL 已能夠以自己的步調轉移與發展即時通訊市場。 在這樣的安排下，這種自由可能會告終。 雅虎和微軟服務的使用者人數加總，將可匹敵 AOL 的客戶數量。
mt: With its widespread use in the U.S., AOL can set its own pace in developing the instant messaging market.  In this arrangement, that freedom may come to an end.  The number of users of Yahoo and Microsoft services combined could match AOL's customer base.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. src: 昨天早上在土耳其加濟安泰普警察總部引爆的汽車炸彈，造成兩名員警死亡以及超過二十位民眾受傷。 省長辦公室表示傷患中有十九名是警察。 警方說，他們懷疑這起攻擊是由達伊沙（伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯蘭國）的好戰嫌疑犯所為。
mt: 19 people were injured and two police officers were killed in a car bomb explosion outside the Gaziantep police headquarters in Turkey on Monday morning. The provincial governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected the attack was carried out by militants from the Islamic State.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 前麻薩諸塞州州長米特‧羅姆尼週二以超過 46% 的選票贏下佛羅里達共和黨總統初選。 前美國眾議院​議長紐特‧金瑞契以 32% 的選票位居第二。 作為贏者全拿的州，佛羅里達州的五十名代表全數歸予羅姆尼，這使他成為共和黨提名的領先者。
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich was second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Florida's 50 delegates all go to Romney, making him the front-runner for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: 前眾議院​議長紐特‧金瑞契、德克薩斯州州長瑞克‧裴利及女眾議員米歇爾‧巴克曼分別名列第四、五、六名。 結果出爐後，金瑞契恭賀桑托榮，卻對羅姆尼說了重話，因為他在在愛荷華州播放了針對金瑞契的負面競選廣告。 裴利表示，他將「返回德州評估今晚決策會議結果，判斷自己在這場選戰中是否還有機會繼續挺進」，但後來卻說他將繼續參選，並參加 1 月 21 日的南卡羅萊納州初選。 巴赫曼在八月份的埃姆斯民意調查中獲勝，並決定終止競選。

ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: 該電臺的網站形容這個節目是「老套的廣播劇，但具有極其古怪的反轉，充滿新意！」 早期，這個節目只有在一個經營許久的網路電台 TogiNet 上播出，TogiNet 是一個聚焦於談話性廣播節目的電台。 在 2015 年末，TogiNet 成立了 AstroNet 電台，做為其子電台。 該節目原本是由東德州當地的業餘配音員擔綱。
mt: The show is described as "a tired radio drama, but with an extremely quirky twist, full of surprises!" Early on, the show was only broadcast on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet, which focuses on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established the AstroNet radio station as a subsidiary. The show was originally hosted by amateur voice actors from the East Texas area.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: 孟買恐攻者在 2008 年 11 月 26 日搭船抵達，他們攜帶著手榴彈和自動武器，並攻擊多個目標，包括擁擠的賈特拉帕蒂·希瓦吉終點站和著名的泰姬瑪哈酒店。 大衛·韓德利的偵查與資訊聚會促成了由 10 名來自巴基斯坦激進組織虔誠軍的槍手所為的行動。 此攻擊為印度和巴基斯坦間的關係帶來巨大壓力。
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers arrived by boat, carrying grenades and automatic weapons and attacking multiple targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus and the famous Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. David Headley's surveillance and information gathering led to the action by 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack put enormous pressure on relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. src: 除了周三的比賽，卡潘內多 (Carpanedo) 也參加了錦標賽中的兩場個別賽事。 她的第一場比賽是小迴轉賽，第一回合以未完賽收場。該場比賽的 116 名選手中，有 36 名取得了相同的成績。 她的另一場比賽是大迴轉賽，她以 4 分 41 秒 30 的綜合時間名列坐式滑雪女子組第 10 名，比名列第 1 的奧地利選手克勞迪亞．洛許 (Claudia Loesch) 慢了 2 分 11 秒 60，比名列第 9 的匈牙利選手潔爾吉．丹尼 (Gyöngyi Dani) 慢了 1 分 09 秒 02。 女子坐式團體中有四位滑雪者未能完成比賽，在大迴轉賽的 117 位滑雪者中，有 45 位未在比賽中獲得排名。
mt: In addition to Wednesday's competition, Carpanedo also competed in two individual events at the championships. Her first event was the short track, which she did not finish in the first round. Of the 116 competitors in the event, 36 finished with the same score. Her other event was the long track, where she finished tenth in the women's sitting with a combined time of 4 minutes 41.30 seconds, behind Austria's Claudia Loesch by 2 minutes 11.60 seconds and Hungary's Gyongyi Dani by 1 minute 9.02 seconds. Four of the five women's sitting team did not finish the competition, and of the 117 competitors in the long track, 45 did not finish the race and were not ranked.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: 獲得今日最佳球員的是華盛頓首都隊的亞歷克斯．歐維契金。 在華盛頓以五比三擊敗亞特蘭大鶇鳥的比賽中，他進了兩球並有兩次助攻。 奧維琴根當晚第一記助攻，就獻給新人尼可拉斯‧巴克斯卓打進的那顆致勝球； 他當晚的第二次射門得分，是他在該賽季的第 60 次得分，這使他成為 1995-96 賽季以來第一位在單一賽季進 60 球以上的球員。亞羅米爾·佳格 (Jaromir Jagr) 和馬里奧·拉謬 (Mario Lemieux) 在 1995-96 賽季中分別達到這個里程碑。

src: 在傳出銀行獲得英國政府緊急紓困的消息後，北岩銀行於 2008 年國有化。 北岩銀行受 2007 年的次級房貸危機影響而請求協助。 理查‧布蘭森爵士的維珍集團在該銀行國有化之前曾出價收購但遭拒。 2010 年，如今的高街銀行北岩銀行公眾有限公司儘管已經國有化，但卻從被稱為「壞銀行」的北岩（資產管理）分離出來。 維珍集團只購買了北岩銀行旗下的「優良銀行」，而非該資產管理公司。
mt: 2008, Northern Rock was nationalized after the government provided emergency assistance. Northern Rock was affected by the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had bid to buy the bank before it was nationalized, but was rejected. In 2010, the current Northern Rock plc, which is now publicly owned, was separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin Group only bought the "good bank" Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: 在星期四的東京電玩展主題演講中，任天堂總裁岩田聰公布了公司新的任天堂 Revolution 遊戲機。 控制器類似電視遙控器，利用兩個放置在使用者電視旁邊的感測器，以三角測量方式在立體空間中測量其位置。 這將讓玩家透過在空中揮動裝置以控制電子遊戲中的動作和移動。
mt: In a keynote address at the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the company's new Nintendo Revolution game console. The controller resembles a television remote, using two sensors placed next to the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movement in electronic games by waving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. mt: In a keynote address at the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the company's new Nintendo Revolution game console. src: 瑞典學院諾貝爾文學委員會常任秘書莎拉．戴紐斯，週一在瑞典的瑞典廣播電台節目中公開表示，委員會因為無法直接與巴布．狄倫聯繫領取 2016 年諾貝爾文學獎事宜，已放棄嘗試。 戴紐斯說：「現在我們什麼都不做。我打過電話、也寄了電子郵件給他最親近的合作夥伴，也收到很友善的回覆。就現在來說，那樣的確就夠了。」
mt: Sarah Daniels, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced on Monday in a Swedish radio program that the committee has given up trying to contact Bob Dylan directly to award him the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. "We're not doing anything now," Daniels said. "I've called him, I've emailed his closest collaborators, and I've received very friendly replies. That's enough for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: 斯拉尼亞於 1956 年搬到了瑞典。三年後，他開始為瑞典郵政局工作，並成為了他們的首席雕刻師。 他為瑞典和其他 28 個國家製作了一千多枚郵票。 他的作品擁有如此高辨識度的品質和細節，這使他成為集郵家之間極少數「家喻戶曉」的人物之一。有些集郵家甚至只蒐集他的作品。 他所雕刻的第 1,000 款郵票是大衛·科洛克·埃倫斯特拉爾 (David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl) 2000 年的畫作──壯麗的《 瑞典國王偉大事蹟》，該作品被收錄於金氏世界紀錄中。 他也參與許多國家的紙鈔雕刻工作，近期作品包括加拿大 5 元及 100 元新鈔上的總理肖像。
mt: 1956, he moved to Sweden. Three years later, he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He designed over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has such high recognition quality and detail that he is one of the few "household names" among philatelists. Some collectors even collect only his work. His 1,000th stamp was the 2000 painting of David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl's "Magnificent Swedish Royal Achievements", which is recorded in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also participated in the engraving work of many countries' paper money, including the recent Canadian 5 and 100 dollar bills with the prime minister's portrait.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 數千桶原油在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南外漏之後， 800 英里的縱貫阿拉斯加管道遭到關閉。 斷電之後，隨之而來的是常規的火災指揮系統測試，導致放洩閥開啟，使原油流洩到附近的格里利堡 9 號泵站。 開啟的閥門導致系統壓力釋放，原油則自能儲存 55,000 桶（230 萬加侖）的油槽溢出至輸送平台。 截至週三下午，油槽排氣孔仍在漏油，可能是油槽內部的熱膨脹所致。 油槽下方有另一個能容納 104,500 桶的第二攔油區，目前尚未裝滿。
mt: 8,000 barrels of oil leaked from a pipeline south of Fairbanks, Alaska, and the 800-mile pipeline that runs through Alaska was closed. After the power outage, the regular fire command system test was triggered, which opened the release valve, causing oil to leak into the nearby Pump Station No. 9 in Grizzly. The opening of the valve caused the system pressure to be released, and the oil leaked from the storage tank that could store 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons) of oil. As of Wednesday afternoon, the oil tank vent was still leaking, possibly due to thermal expansion inside the tank. There is another containment area that can hold 104,500 barrels below the tank, which is not yet full.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to wash away the levees that were damaged by Katrina. The Ninth Ward was flooded up to 20 feet during Katrina, and is now up to the waist, with the levees submerged. The water is overflowing the levees in a 100-foot wide area.

src: 地球上的水可能是彗星帶來的，水中的有機物質則可以形成蛋白質並供應生命所需。 科學家希望瞭解星球形成的過程，尤其是地球，因為彗星在很久以前曾與地球相撞。
mt: Water on Earth may have come from comets, and the organic material in the water could have formed proteins and supplied the needs of life. Scientists hope to understand the process of planet formation, especially Earth, because comets collided with Earth a long time ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

mt: The Maryland Transportation Authority could not confirm the threat was real, but decided to close the tunnel anyway under pressure from the FBI. A tractor-trailer was used to block each of the tunnel's entrances, and 80 officers helped direct drivers to other routes. The city's alternate route, the Beltway, was not reported to be heavily congested.

src: 該名攝影師被送往加州大學洛杉磯分校雷根醫學中心，之後仍不幸死亡。 據報導，他當時的年紀是 20 多歲。 在一份聲明中，小賈斯汀說：「雖然我當時不在現場，這起悲劇事件與我也沒有直接的牽涉，但我非常關心受害者的家屬，並為他們祈禱。」 娛樂新聞網站 TMZ 獲知，該名攝影師在塞普爾韋達大道 (Sepulveda Boulevard) 的對側停下車，試圖在穿過馬路並繼續前進之前對警察攔停點拍照，這促使加州公路巡警的警官兩次執行交通攔停，命令他回到車道對面。 警方表示，撞到該攝影師的駕駛人可能不會面臨刑事指控。
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was in his early 20s, according to reports. In a statement, Justin said, "Although I wasn't there, this tragedy doesn't involve me directly, but I'm concerned about the family of the victim and I'm praying for them." TMZ learned that the photographer stopped his car on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard, trying to take a picture of the police stop point before crossing the street and continuing forward. The California Highway Patrol officer executed a traffic stop twice, ordering him to return to the other side of the road. The driver who hit the photographer may not face criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: 腰鞭毛藻是一種天然生成的單細胞海洋微生物，當此生物的濃度比平常高時，就會出現紅潮。 自然因素可以交互作用產生理想的環境，讓這種藻類的數量急速增加。 這種藻類會產生神經毒素，癱瘓人類和魚類的神經。 魚類常死於水中高濃度的毒素。 人類可能會吸入被風和海浪帶入空中的含毒水，因而受到影響。
mt: 1. A single-celled marine microbe that is naturally produced. When the concentration of this organism is higher than usual, red tide occurs. Natural factors can interact to produce an ideal environment, allowing the number of this algae to increase rapidly. This algae produces neurotoxins that paralyze humans and fish. Fish often die in water with high concentrations of toxins. Humans may be affected by inhaling water containing toxins that are brought by the wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: 原為薩菲爾-辛普森颶風風力等級分類中第四級颶風的費莉希亞在星期二消散前減弱為熱帶低氣壓。 它的殘餘影響為多數島嶼帶來陣雨，不過迄今為止，還沒有災害或洪水的報導。 歐胡島的降水量經估量已來到 6.34 英寸，可說是「很有幫助」。 有時降雨會伴隨著雷鳴與經常性的閃電。
mt: Before it dissipated on Tuesday, Felicia was downgraded from a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale to a tropical depression. It brought rain to most islands, but there have been no reports of damage or flooding. The rainfall was estimated at 6.34 inches, which is "very helpful." Rain is often accompanied by thunder and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: 2008 年新加坡大獎賽中，小畢奇在費爾南多·阿隆索短暫停車檢修不久後，就發生撞車事故，導致安全車出動。 當阿隆索前面的汽車在安全車的引領下進站加油時，他移動到車隊的前方以取得勝利。 小畢奇在 2009 年匈牙利大獎賽後失去賽車手的身分。
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, Button collided with Fernando Alonso after Alonso's brief pit stop, resulting in a safety car. As Alonso's car in front of the safety car was being refueled, Button moved to the front to take the win. Button lost his driver's status after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: 星期四刊登在《科學》期刊的一篇研究報導了厄瓜多的加拉巴哥群島正在形成鳥類新物種。 儘管過去人們認為新物種的演化過程歷時更久，但來自美國普林斯頓大學與瑞士烏普薩拉大學的研究人員卻發現這個新物種在短短兩個世代內就演化出來了，其為當地特有種達爾文雀（Geospiza fortes）和外來的仙人掌雀（Geospiza fortes）的混種。
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported that a new species of bird is forming on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Although people previously thought that the evolution of new species took longer, researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden found that the new species evolved in just two generations, a hybrid of the local Darwin's finch (Geospiza fortes) and the introduced cactus finch (Geospiza fortes).
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: 飛機原定由內務部內衛部隊駕駛飛往伊爾庫次克。 一支調查小組奉命成立。 伊爾-76 自 1970 年代起即為俄羅斯及蘇聯軍事重要的一部分，上個月已經在俄羅斯發生一起重大事故。 10 月 7 日，一架引擎在起飛時脫落，無人受傷。事故發生後，俄羅斯短暫停飛了 Il-76。
mt: The plane was to be flown by the Interior Ministry's National Guard to Yelizovo. An investigation team has been formed. src: 在《辛普森家庭》之前，西蒙曾在幾場演出中擔任不同角色。 1980 年代，他參與了多個電視節目的製作，包括 《計程車》、《歡樂酒吧》及《 特蕾西·厄爾曼秀》。 1989 年，他與布魯克斯和格寧一起合作，協助創作出《辛普森家庭》，並負責為該劇雇用第一個編劇團隊。 儘管他在 1993 年退出節目，他仍保留了執行製作人的頭銜，並持續在每一季獲得數千萬元的版稅收入。
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked in a variety of roles in several productions, including Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show in the 1980s. In 1989, he teamed up with Brooks and Groening to help create The Simpsons, and hired the first writing staff. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive millions of dollars in royalties from each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: 弗路克寫到：企圖掩蓋女性疾呼婦女健康的作為都不會成功。 她之所以得到這個結論，是因為收到了許多來自女性和男性的正向留言與鼓勵，極力主張將避孕藥物視為醫療必需品。
mt: In her post, Fluke wrote: "Attempts to silence women's voices on women's health will not succeed. I came to this conclusion because I received so many positive messages from women and men, urging me to continue to advocate for contraception as a medical necessity."
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: 「它的特性就跟水一樣。透明如水。 因此，若你站在岸邊，你將能往下看到底部的鵝卵石或泥濘等東西。 據我們所知，只有一個天體比泰坦星更有活力，它就叫地球。」斯托凡補充說。
mt: "It's like water. It's transparent like water. So if you're standing on the shore, you can see down to the bottom of the pebbles or the mud or whatever is there. As far as we know, there's only one body in the solar system that's more active than Titan, and that's Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: 這不僅證明了一個廣泛流傳的理論，認為至少某些恐龍有羽毛，也提供了大部分化石無法提供的細節，例如顏色和立體組成方式。 科學家說這種動物的羽毛外層是栗棕色，內層是泛白的顏色或胡蘿蔔色。 該發現也為鳥類羽毛的進化提供深入的見解。 因為恐龍的羽毛缺乏發展健全的軸，所謂羽軸，但確實存在其他羽毛特性，即羽枝與羽小枝，因此研究者推論，這些其他特性後來很可能就進化成了羽軸。 這些羽毛的結構顯示它們不是用來飛行而是用來調節溫度或展示的。研究人員表示，即使這是年輕恐龍的尾巴，該樣本也顯示其為成熟羽毛而非幼雛絨毛。 研究人員認為，儘管這是一頭年輕恐龍的尾巴，但樣本中的羽毛已完全發育，而不是年幼動物的新生毛。

ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. src: 儘管有一種實驗性的疫苗顯示能降低伊波拉病毒的致死率，但到目前為止，沒有藥物明確證實適合治療已受感染的人。 其中一種抗體雞尾酒 ZMapp，起初很可望在實務上帶來好消息，但正式研究指出，它的效果並未達到預防死亡的預期目標。 ZMapp 在 PALM 試驗中作為對照組，代表科學家將其視為基準，與其他三種治療方法相比較。
mt: Although an experimental vaccine has shown to reduce the mortality rate of Ebola virus, there is no drug that has been proven to be effective in treating people who have been infected. One of the antibody cocktails, ZMapp, initially brought good news in practice, but formal research showed that it did not meet the expected target of preventing death. ZMapp was used as a control group in the PALM trial, representing that scientists viewed it as a benchmark, compared with the other three treatment methods.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 史丹佛大學醫學院的科學家於週一宣布發明一項新型診斷工具，可依類型將細胞分類：這是一種細小的可列印芯片，使用標準噴墨印表機就能印出，每個芯片的成本大約一美分。 主要研究人員表示，這或許可以讓低收入國家的癌症、肺結核、愛滋病毒及瘧疾病患早期發現病症。在這些國家，乳癌等疾病患者的存活率是較富裕國家的一半。
mt: Scientists at Stanford University School of Medicine announced on Monday that they have invented a new diagnostic tool that can classify cells by type: a tiny chip that can be printed using a standard inkjet printer, and costs about a dime each. The main researchers say it could allow early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, AIDS and malaria in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases like breast cancer are half those in wealthier nations.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: 科學家發現月球表面分布許多稱為瓣狀陡坡的地形，顯然是因為月球正極緩慢縮小而形成。 月球上到處都是這種陡坡，而且風化程度很小，這顯示創造陡坡的地質事件發生於不久之前。 此理論與月球完全沒有地質活動的說法相違悖。
mt: Scientists have found that the lunar surface is dotted with steep-sided features called lobate scarps, which were apparently created by the slow shrinking of the lunar north pole. The scarps are everywhere on the moon, and are not very eroded, indicating that the geologic event that created them happened not long ago. This theory contradicts the notion that the moon is completely geologically inactive.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya（阿代科亞） 隨後在愛丁堡郡法院被控謀殺她的兒子。 她正被拘留中，等候起訴和審判，但由於她的影像已被廣泛發布，任何目擊者的證詞都可能受到汙染。 這是英國其他地區的普遍做法，不過蘇格蘭司法的運作方式卻有所不同，法院認為發布照片會造成潛在的偏見。 丹地大學的帕梅拉‧弗格森教授指出：「如果發布嫌疑人的照片等資料，記者確實顯得遊走在險路上。」 負責整體檢察事宜的蘇格蘭皇家檢察院向記者表示，至少在起訴前，將不再做出任何評論。
mt: Adekoya was later charged with murdering her son at Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She is being held in custody pending her indictment and trial, but because her image has been widely disseminated, any witness testimony could be tainted. This is the general practice in other parts of the UK, but the workings of the Scottish judiciary are different, and the court felt that releasing photos would create potential prejudice. Pamela Ferguson, a professor at the University of Dundee, said, "If you release the suspect's photos and other information, reporters are walking a tightrope." The Crown Office, which is responsible for the prosecution as a whole, told reporters that they would not comment on the case until the indictment.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: 羅伯茲斷然拒絕說明他所相信的生命起始點，這在墮胎倫理議題上是非常重要的問題，並表示評論特定可能的具體情況是不道德的。 然而，他重申了他先前的說法：「羅訴韋德案」是「國家的既定法律」，並強調了最高法院一致裁決的重要性。 他也確認，他深信羅訴韋德案所仰賴的隱含隱私權。
mt: Roberts abruptly refused to explain what he believes is the point of life's beginning, which is a very important issue in the ethics of abortion, and said it is unethical to comment on specific possible circumstances. However, he reiterated his previous statement that "Roe v. Wade" is "the established law of the nation" and emphasized the importance of the unanimous decision of the Supreme Court. He also confirmed that he deeply believes in the implicit privacy of Roe v. Wade.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: 這些洞穴入口被稱為「七姊妹海蝕洞」，直徑至少達 100 至 250 公尺（328 至 820 英尺）。 紅外線影像顯示其日夜溫差，顯現這些地方可能是洞穴。 「它們在白天比附近的平面更冷，夜晚則比附近的平面熱。 「它們的熱行為不像地球上的大型洞穴那樣穩定、往往維持較一致的溫度，而是與深入地下的洞穴較為相近。」美國地理調查協會 (USGS) 天體地質學小組成員，亞利桑那州弗拉格斯塔夫北亞利桑那大學的葛倫‧庫欣表示。
mt: These cave entrances are called the Seven Sisters Sea Caves, with diameters of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). Infrared images show their day-night temperature differences, suggesting that these areas may be caves. "They are cooler than the surrounding flat areas during the day, and warmer than the surrounding flat areas at night," said Glenn Cushing, a USGS planetary geologist at Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona. "Their thermal behavior is not as stable as large terrestrial caves, which often maintain a more consistent temperature, but is more like that of caves that go deeper underground."
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: 南非隊在南非勒斯滕堡的皇家班巴夫肯球場舉辦的英式橄欖球三國聯賽中打敗了全黑隊（紐西蘭）。 最後以 21 比 20 的比分一分獲勝，終止了紐西蘭國家橄欖球隊的 15 場連勝。 對 Springboks 隊來說，這也終結了五連敗。 這是黑衫軍的最後一場比賽，該隊在兩週前已贏得獎盃。 該系列賽的最後一場比賽將於下週，當南非國家橄欖球隊在澳洲比賽時，在約翰尼斯堡的艾利斯公園球場舉行。
mt: South Africa beat New Zealand 21-20 in the final of the Tri-Nations rugby union tournament at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The Springboks ended New Zealand's 15-match winning streak and ended their own five-match losing streak. The Springboks won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will be played next week when South Africa plays Australia in Johannesburg's Ellis Park Stadium.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: 他們發現太陽的運作與其他恆星的基本原理相同：系統中所有恆星的活動均受其光度、自轉所推動，就是這麼簡單。 恆星的羅士比數跟電漿的流動有關，必須以光度和自轉來判斷。 羅士比數越小，星體在磁場逆轉方面就越不活躍。
mt: They found that the Sun's operation is similar in basic principles to other stars: all the activity in the system is driven by its luminosity and rotation, that's all. The Rossby number is related to the plasma flow, and must be determined by luminosity and rotation. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in reversing the magnetic field.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 在 2010 年聯邦選舉之前投票的 1400 人中，反對澳洲成為共和國的人數，比 2008 年多了 8%。 看守總理茱莉亞‧吉拉德在 2010 年聯邦選舉的競選活動期間宣稱，她認為澳洲應該在伊莉莎白二世女王任期卸任時成為共和國。 民調中有 34 % 的人同意這個觀點，希望伊麗莎白二世女王成為澳洲的最後一位君主。 在民調的兩個極端結果中，29% 的受訪者認為澳洲應該盡快成為共和國，而 31%的人認為澳洲永遠不該成為共和國。
mt: 1400 people who voted before the 2010 federal election, the number of people who opposed Australia becoming a republic increased by 8% compared to 2008. Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during her campaign for the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic when Queen Elizabeth II's reign ended. 34% of people agreed with this view, hoping that Elizabeth II would be Australia's last monarch. In the two extreme results of the survey, 29% of respondents believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believed that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: 蘇珊科曼乳癌基金會發言人雷斯莉‧昂表示，該組織新增規定，不得對正接受法律調查的組織贈予或貸予資金。 由於國會議員克里夫‧斯特恩斯還在調查美國計劃生育聯盟支出及報銷其費用的方式，科曼的政策遂取消了美國計劃生育聯盟的資格。 身為美國眾議院能源及貿易委員會的監督和調查小組委員會的主席，司坦斯正在調查納稅人的錢是否透過「計劃生育協會」被用來資助墮胎。
mt: Susan G. Komen for the Cure spokeswoman Kellie Leigh said the organization has added a new policy that prohibits giving or loaning money to an organization that is under legal investigation. Because Rep. Cliff Stearns is still investigating how Planned Parenthood spent and reimbursed its expenses, Komen's policy has disqualified Planned Parenthood. Stearns is the chairman of the House Energy and Commerce Committee's oversight and investigations subcommittee and is investigating whether tax payer money is being used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

mt: 1 January, residents of the town of Eifuku-machi in Yamaguchi Prefecture began complaining to the local post office that they had not received the traditional New Year's cards they had come to expect. src: 早在《每日秀》和《科拜爾報告》之前，1988 年赫克和詹森還是華盛頓大學的學生時，便已設想出一種以諷刺滑稽的方式模仿新聞和新聞報導的刊物。 自成立以來，洋蔥報已經成為一個名符其實的惡搞新聞王國，旗下事業囊括了印刷版新聞、光十月單月就吸引了 5 百萬獨立讀者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網、podcast、以及最近新發行的世界地圖集《Our Dumb World》。 艾爾·高爾和湯米·弗蘭克斯將軍不假思索地說出了他們最喜歡的頭條新聞（高爾的便是《洋蔥報》有關他和蒂珀在 2000 年選舉人團落敗後享受了一生中最美好的性愛的報導）。 許多《洋蔥報》的作者持續對喬恩・史都華及史蒂芬・荷伯的新聞脫口秀造成大幅的影響。
mt: 1988, before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Jon Stewart and Ben Karlin were students at the University of Washington when they first conceived of a satirical newspaper that would mock the news and news reporting. Since its inception, The Onion has become a kingdom of parody news, with print news, a website that attracts 5 million independent readers a month, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, a podcast, and most recently, a world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and Tommy Franks would not hesitate to tell you their favorite headlines (Gore's being the Onion's report on his and Tipper's best sex ever after the 2000 electoral college loss). Many of the Onion's writers have had a huge impact on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news satire shows.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: 抗議活動在當地時間約 11 點開始 (UTC+1)，地點在白廳街，正對著有警察駐守的唐寧街首相官邸入口。 才剛過11點，抗議者就封鎖了白廳北向車道的交通。 警察在 11 點 20 分要求抗議者退回到人行道，並對抗議者表明他們得在抗議權和堵塞交通間取得平衡。 11:29 左右，示威者朝白廳移動，越過特拉法加廣場，沿著河岸街，經過奧德維奇，自金斯威往北朝霍本前進，當時保守黨正於此處的格蘭康納特飯店舉行春季座談會。
mt: 11:00 am (UTC+1) protests began on Whitehall, facing the Downing Street entrance guarded by police. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked the northbound traffic on Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked protesters to return to the sidewalk and made clear that they had to balance their right to protest and block traffic. At around 11:29, protesters moved towards Whitehall, crossing Trafalgar Square, along the Embankment, through Old Palace Yard, and up King Street towards Horse Guards, where the Conservatives were holding their Spring Conference at the Grand Connaught Rooms.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: 「我們有 4 個月大曾經罹患糖尿病老鼠現在沒有糖尿病了」他補充道。 位於新斯科舍省哈利法克斯的戴爾豪斯大學醫學教授、加拿大糖尿病協會臨床及科學部門主席埃胡德·烏爾 (Ehud Ur) 醫師警告說，此研究仍在初期階段。 如同其他專家，他對糖尿病是否可以治癒存疑，並指出這些發現與已經患有第一型糖尿病的人無關。
mt: "We have mice that were four months old and had diabetes that are now diabetes-free," he added. Ehud Ur, a medical professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. Like other experts, he expressed doubt that diabetes can be cured and said the findings are unrelated to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: 這架巴布亞紐幾內亞航空航班編號 CG4684 的雙水獺飛機，昨天試圖降落在科科達，但已經失敗過一次。 它消失在第二次試圖降落過程中即將著陸的十分鐘前。 墜機地點已於今日確認，且因該地點難以到達，因此由兩名警員空降至叢林裡，以便步行至事故現場尋找倖存者。 搜索行動同樣受到導致無法降落的惡劣天氣阻礙。
mt: The Papua New Guinea Airlines flight CG4684, a Twin Otter, had already failed to land at Kokoda once yesterday. It disappeared in the minutes before it was about to land on its second attempt. The crash site was confirmed today, but the difficult terrain made it hard to reach, so two police officers were air-dropped into the jungle to walk to the crash site to look for survivors. The search was also hampered by the bad weather that caused the plane to be unable to land.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: 「我很幸運地毫髮無傷，但我目睹了大家試著打破窗戶逃生的恐怖景象。」 人們用椅子砸玻璃，但窗戶堅不可破。 其中一塊玻璃終於破了，他們開始從窗戶逃出。」倖存者弗朗西斯克·科瓦爾 (Franciszek Kowal) 說。
mt: "I was lucky to escape unharmed, but I witnessed the terrifying sight of people trying to break the windows to escape," said survivor Franciszek Kowal. "They were using chairs to break the glass, but the windows were too strong. Finally, one of the windows broke, and they started escaping through the windows."
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: 熱帶低氣壓丹妮爾，是 2010 年大西洋颶風季第四個獲得命名的風暴，於大西洋東部形成。 這場颶風距離佛羅里達州邁阿密約三千英里，最大持續風速是每小時 40 英里（每小時 64 公里）。 美國國家颶風中心的科學家預測熱帶風暴丹妮爾會在周三增強為颶風。 預計暴風雨還要很久才會登陸，會對美國或加勒比海地區造成多大的影響還很難說。
mt: Tropical Depression Danielle is the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, which formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm is about 300 miles (480 km) east of Miami, Florida, and has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict Danielle will strengthen into a hurricane on Wednesday. It is too early to tell what kind of impact the storm will have on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports of asymptomatic A(H5N1) avian flu infection in children in Turkey. He noted that some research suggests that the disease must become less deadly before it can cause a global pandemic. Worrisome is that patients with mild flu symptoms may continue to infect others through daily activities.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 馬德立昨日在由九名委員組成的臨時選舉委員會 (CEP) 中宣誓。 這是馬德立四年內的第五個臨時選舉委員會。 作為推動國家邁向新選舉之成套措施的一環，總統委員會在上個月建議前任臨時選舉委員會辭職。 該委員會是馬德立回應從十月開始的大規模反政權抗議活動而設立的。 這些有時會使用暴力的抗議活動，起因是無法舉行選舉，有些選舉早在 2011 年就該舉行了。
mt: Maduro was sworn in on Monday before a nine-member temporary election council (CEP). This is the fifth temporary election council in four years. As part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections, the presidential council recommended the resignation of the previous temporary election council last month. That council was set up by Maduro in response to large-scale anti-government protests that began in October and sometimes used violence. The protests were sparked by the inability to hold elections, some of which were due to be held in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: 馬德立昨日在由九名委員組成的臨時選舉委員會 (CEP) 中宣誓。 這是馬德立四年內的第五個臨時選舉委員會。 作為推動國家邁向新選舉之成套措施的一環，總統委員會在上個月建議前任臨時選舉委員會辭職。 該委員會是馬德立回應從十月開始的大規模反政權抗議活動而設立的。 這些有時會使用暴力的抗議活動，起因是無法舉行選舉，有些選舉早在 2011 年就該舉行了。
mt: Maduro was sworn in on Monday before a nine-member temporary election council (CEP). This is the fifth temporary election council in four years. As part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections, the presidential council recommended the resignation of the previous temporary election council last month. That council was set up by Maduro in response to large-scale anti-government protests that began in October and sometimes used violence. The protests were sparked by the inability to hold elections, some of which were due to be held in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: 美國體操協會為美國奧委會的來信背書，並認同奧林匹克大家庭絕對有需要為我們所有的運動員推動安全的環境。 我們同意美國奧委會的聲明，也就是我們的選手、團隊和其運動項目的利益，會因為我們組織內具有意義的改革而改善，而非取消資格。 美國體操協會支持一項獨立調查，這項調查可能有助於釐清，在賴瑞·納薩爾事件中倖存下來的人提起勇氣描述的虐待內容，長期以來無人發現的原因，且會引入任何必需且妥當的調整。 美國體操協會和美國奧委會擁有相同的目標，也就是讓體操和其他運動儘可能安全，讓運動員得以在安全、正向和擁有自主權的環境中，追尋自己的夢想。
mt: The USA Gymnastics Board of Directors has reviewed the letter from the USOC and agrees with the statement that our athletes, teams and sport will be better served by meaningful reforms within our organization, not by decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may help clarify the reasons why the abuse described by survivors in the Larry Nassar case went undetected for so long and will implement any necessary and appropriate adjustments. USA Gymnastics and the USOC share the same goal of making gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and self-determined environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 美國海軍表示他們正在調查該起事件。 他們也在一項聲明中表示：「全體船員正努力尋求將船安全拖出的方法。」 該艦是復仇者級的反水雷艦，當時正前往巴拉望的普林塞薩港。 這艘船被派給美國海軍的第七艦隊，並常駐日本長崎的佐世保市。
mt: The U.S. Navy said it was investigating the incident. It also said in a statement that "all hands are working to find a way to safely tow the ship out." src: 星期日傍晚，美國總統唐納‧川普透過新聞秘書發表聲明，宣布美國軍隊將撤離敘利亞。 川普與土耳其總統艾爾多安通過電話後便發表這則聲明。 該聲明表示，土耳其也將負責看守遭囚禁的伊斯蘭國 (ISIS) 成員，歐洲眾國拒將那些成員遣送回國。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that American troops would be withdrawing from Syria. Trump had spoken to Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan by phone before making the announcement. The statement said that Turkey would also be responsible for guarding ISIS members who were being held captive, and that European countries had refused to repatriate those members.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 1963 年大壩建成後，便抑止了將沉積物帶往整片河川的季節性洪水。 這些沉積物是形成野生動物棲地的河口沙洲和海灘的必要物質。 結果，兩種魚類已經滅絕，而包括隆背骨尾魚在內的其他兩種則瀕臨滅絕。 雖然在洪水過後，水位只會上升幾英尺，政府仍希望這足以恢復下游被侵蝕的沙洲。
mt: 1963, the dam was built to prevent seasonal floods from carrying sediment downstream. These sediments are necessary for the formation of wild animal habitats in the river mouth and beaches. As a result, two species of fish have already gone extinct, and two others, including the longnose dace, are on the brink of extinction. Although the water level only rises a few feet after the flood, the government hopes this is enough to restore the downstream eroded sandbars.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: 知名的希臘律師薩基斯凱亥尤基由（Sakis Kechagioglou）和熱格尼科拉克波琉斯（George Nikolakopoulos）因為他們被判貪污和腐敗有罪，已被關在雃典的柯里達洛斯（Korydallus）看守所。 為此之故，法官、律師、事務律師及檢察官過去幾年來從事過的非法行為也跟著曝光，從而揭發了希臘司法體系的大醜聞。 幾個禮拜前，記者麥基斯 (Makis Triantafylopoulos) 在他於阿爾法電視台的熱門節目《Zoungla》中披露此訊息後，國會議員暨律師貝佐斯 (Petros Mantouvalos) 旋即因辦公室成員曾涉及非法賄賂和貪腐而下台。 此外，首席法官依凡傑洛斯・克勞西斯因涉嫌貪瀆及墮落行為而鋃鐺入獄。
mt: Notable Greek lawyer Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were imprisoned in Korydallus prison in Korydallos, Athens, for their conviction of bribery and corruption. This led to the exposure of the Greek judicial system's scandal. A few weeks ago, journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos revealed this information on his popular show Zoungla on Alpha TV, and Petros Mantouvalos, a member of parliament and lawyer, was forced to resign after his office was involved in illegal bribery and corruption. In addition, Chief Justice Ifigeneia Koulouris was imprisoned for bribery and corruption.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

mt: Robin Uthappa set a new record for the highest score in a T20 match, scoring 41 runs in 70 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. src: 維基共享資源 (Commons) 管理師亞當‧庫爾登上個月向維基新聞 (Wikinews) 透露他對刪減的不滿。 「基本上他（威爾斯）從一開始就對我們撒謊。首先假裝這是出自法律考量；其次，假裝在聽我們說話，直到他的作品被刪除。」 該網站為數百萬個獲得公開許可的媒體提供服務，而社群的不滿促使相關單位目前正在努力為該網站起草一項關於性內容的政策。
mt: Wikimedia Commons administrator Adam Wight revealed his dissatisfaction with the deletion to Wikinews last month. "Basically he lied to us from the beginning. First pretending it was a legal issue; second pretending to listen to us until his work was deleted." The site provides services to millions of media with public licenses, and the dissatisfaction of the community has prompted the relevant unit to currently work on a policy for the site regarding sexual content.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: 維基共享資源 (Commons) 管理師亞當‧庫爾登上個月向維基新聞 (Wikinews) 透露他對刪減的不滿。 「基本上他（威爾斯）從一開始就對我們撒謊。首先假裝這是出自法律考量；其次，假裝在聽我們說話，直到他的作品被刪除。」 該網站為數百萬個獲得公開許可的媒體提供服務，而社群的不滿促使相關單位目前正在努力為該網站起草一項關於性內容的政策。
mt: Wikimedia Commons administrator Adam Wight revealed his dissatisfaction with the deletion to Wikinews last month. "Basically he lied to us from the beginning. First pretending it was a legal issue; second pretending to listen to us until his work was deleted." The site provides services to millions of media with public licenses, and the dissatisfaction of the community has prompted the relevant unit to currently work on a policy for the site regarding sexual content.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: 並非所有人都支持加入女性的排名。 2004 年奧運銀牌得主阿米爾·汗說：「我深深認為女性不該參與打鬥。這就是我的想法。」 儘管他做出那樣的評論，他仍表示會支持 2012 年倫敦奧運的英國參賽者。
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan said, "I deeply believe that women should not be involved in combat. That's my opinion." Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 London Olympics.

src: 13 歲的摩托車賽車手彼得·倫茨，在印第安納波利斯賽車場的一場車禍中喪生。 蘭茲在熱身圈時摔車，被同為選手的賽維爾‧札亞特撞上。 賽道現場的醫護人員立刻為他急救，並將他送往當地醫院，後來他於該院逝世。 扎耶特並未因事故受傷。
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Lenz fell in the warm-up lap and was hit by fellow racer Savier Zayat. Medical personnel at the track immediately began resuscitation and took him to a local hospital, where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: 無論年紀或背景，坐飛機旅行都可能是個可怕的體驗，尤其是沒坐過飛機或曾有創傷經歷的人。 這並不是什麼丟臉的事：這和許多人害怕或厭惡某些特定的東西沒什麼不同。 對某些人而言，認識飛機的運作原理以及飛行中發生的事，這可能有助於他們克服基於未知或不可控因素的恐懼。
mt: Whether you're young or old, flying on an airplane can be a terrifying experience, especially for those who have never flown or have had traumatic experiences. This is not something to be ashamed of: it's like many people's aversion to certain specific things. For some people, understanding how airplanes work and what happens during flight can help them overcome their fears based on the unknown or uncontrollable factors.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: 如今，很少人會不先經過搜尋或比價，就直接向航空公司訂機票旅行。 有時在不同的資料彙集網站上，同一班機的價差很大，比較搜尋結果之餘，也查查看航空公司本身的網站再下單有其回報。
mt: Today, few people will book a flight without first searching or comparing prices. Sometimes the price difference is huge between different data collection websites, and it is worth checking the airline's own website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: 快遞公司快速將貨品送達，以此收取優渥酬勞。通常在運送商業文件、商品或緊急維修用的零件時，時間非常重要。 規模較大的公司在部分航線上有自己的飛機，但是其他航線或規模較小的公司，就會比較麻煩。 如果他們使用空運寄送東西，則在某些路線上可能要耗費幾天才能完成卸貨與通關。 更快速送達的唯一方法，就是將貨物當成拖運行李寄送。航空公司規定禁止拖運非乘客的行李，此時你的機會就來了。
mt: FedEx and UPS are the two largest overnight delivery companies. They have their own planes and can deliver packages quickly. But for smaller companies, or for companies that need to send documents, goods, or spare parts quickly, it can be a problem. If they use air freight, it can take days to unload and clear customs on some routes. The only way to get it there faster is to send it as checked baggage. Airlines prohibit checked baggage that is not for passengers, but this is your chance.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: 航空聯盟中要選哪家作為飛行常客航空公司應當謹慎考慮。 雖然你可能覺得加入你最常搭乘的航空公司才符合直覺，但你應留意他們提供的優惠通常不同，而且相同聯盟的不同航空公司給予的飛行常客點數可能會更多。
mt: When choosing an airline alliance, be careful. Although you may think that joining the airline you fly most often is intuitive, you should note that their offers are usually different, and the frequent flyer points offered by different airlines in the same alliance may be more.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: 飲用酒精性飲料要適量。酒精對每個人的影響程度不同，因此知道自己的酒量非常重要。 過量飲酒造成的長期健康問題可能包括肝臟受損，甚或失明與死亡。飲用非法釀造的酒也會增加潛在危險。 非法烈酒可能含有各種危險的雜質，包括甲醇，即使是少量都有可能導致失明或死亡。
mt: Drink alcohol in moderation. The effects of alcohol vary from person to person, so knowing your limits is important. Long-term health problems caused by excessive drinking may include liver damage, even blindness or death. Drinking bootleg alcohol also increases the risk. Bootleg alcohol may contain a variety of dangerous contaminants, including methanol, even small amounts of which can cause blindness or death.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
