src: 耶路撒冷是以色列的首都及最大城市，儘管大多數其他國家及聯合國並不承認它是以色列首都。 猶地亞山的古城擁有長達數千年的迷人歷史。 該城市是三種一神教──猶太教、基督教和伊斯蘭教的聖地，也是精神、宗教和文化的中心。 由於宗教上的重要性，特別是舊城區的許多遺址，耶路撒冷成為以色列的主要觀光景點之一。 耶路撒冷擁有許多歷史、考古和文化景點，以及充滿活力且人潮擁擠的購物中心、咖啡廳和餐廳。
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city on the Mount of Olives has a history of thousands of years. The city is a holy place for three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and is a center of spirituality, religion and culture. Due to its religious importance, especially in the Old City, many of the sites, Jerusalem has become one of the main tourist attractions in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites, as well as lively and crowded shopping centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: 克魯格國家公園 (KNP) 位於南非東北部，東接莫三比克，北鄰辛巴威，南邊以鱷魚河為界。 公園占地一萬九千平方公里，劃分為十四個生態區，棲息不同的野生動植物。 它是南非的主要景點之一，也被視為南非國家公園 (SANParks) 的旗艦景點。 如同所有南非國家公園，這座公園設有日常保育及入場費。 也許購買一張 Wild Card 聯票會比較划算，這種聯票可讓你進入南非某些精選的公園，或是南非所有的國家公園。
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa, bordering Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Sabi River to the south. The park covers an area of 19,485 square kilometers and is divided into fourteen ecological zones, each with its own unique wildlife. It is one of South Africa's most popular tourist destinations and is considered the flagship of the South African National Parks (SANParks). Like all South African National Parks, this park has daily conservation and entrance fees. Perhaps buying a Wild Card pass will be more economical, which allows you to enter some of South Africa's selected parks or all of South Africa's national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: 矗立在馬丘比丘北側的陡峭尖山，經常成為許多馬丘比丘遺址照片的背景。 它由下仰望看起來有些嚇人，坡度陡峭難以攀登。但是大部分體力正常的人應該可以在45分鐘內登頂。 大部分的步道都鋪設石階，地勢陡峭的路段則裝上鋼纜作為扶手。 也就是說，要有喘不過氣的心理準備，也要特別小心較陡的部份，尤其是潮濕的時候，因為這可能迅速使情況變得危險。 接近頂端的地方有個必須穿越的小洞穴，它的高度很低且擠出洞有點難度。
mt: The steep peak to the north of Machu Picchu is often the background for many Machu Picchu site photos. It looks a little scary when viewed from below, with its steep slopes difficult to climb. However, most people with normal physical fitness should be able to reach the top in 45 minutes. Most of the paths are paved with stone steps, and steel cables are installed as handrails for the steep parts. So, you need to be mentally prepared for the possibility of running out of breath, and be extra careful for the steeper parts, especially in the rainy season, as this may quickly make the situation dangerous. There is a small cave near the top that you have to pass through, and the height is low and the squeeze through is a little difficult.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: 馬略卡島飲食ㄆ就跟地中海的其他類似地區一樣，以麵包、蔬菜和肉類（特別是豬肉）為主，而且普遍使用橄欖油。 一種簡單的人氣晚餐是 Pa amb Oli，夏季期間尤其流行：麵包配橄欖油、番茄和任何可取得的調味料，例如起司、鮪魚等。
mt: The cuisine of the island of Majorca is similar to other regions of the Mediterranean, with bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork) as the main ingredients, and olive oil is commonly used. A simple popular dinner is Pa amb Oli, especially popular in the summer: bread with olive oil, tomatoes and any available seasoning, such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: 毛利杭吉美食是在地下的熱坑中烹煮。 他們會用火燒過的滾燙石頭加熱坑洞，某些地方則有地熱，讓附近的地面變得滾燙。 土窯常用於烹煮傳統烘烤式的晚餐。 在羅托魯瓦的幾個地方可以吃到地熱土窯料理，而在基督城、威靈頓和其他地方也能品嚐到其他土窯料理。
mt: Māori cuisine is cooked in underground pits. They use hot stones heated in a fire to heat the pit, and in some places there is geothermal heat, making the ground around the pit hot. Earth ovens are used to cook traditional roast-style dinners. A few places in Rotorua serve geothermal earth oven food, and other earth oven food can be found in Christchurch, Wellington, and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: 在造訪修道院時，女子必須穿上過膝的裙子，也不能露肩。 大部分的修道院備有裹巾給沒有準備而來的女性，但如果你自己有準備（特別是鮮豔色彩的款式），入口處的修士或修女就會對你投以微笑。 同樣地，男人必須穿著遮蓋膝蓋的長褲。 您也可以在入口處商借庫存，但這些衣物並未在每位使用者穿著後皆清洗，所以您在穿著這些裙子時可能會稍感不適。男士衣物皆為單一尺碼！
mt: When visiting a convent, women must wear skirts that cover the knees and cannot show their shoulders. Most convents have shawls for women who come without appropriate attire, but if you have your own (especially in bright colors), the monks or nuns at the entrance will smile at you. Similarly, men must wear long pants that cover the knees. You can also borrow from the stock at the entrance, but these clothes are not washed after each use, so you may feel a little uncomfortable wearing these skirts. Men's clothes are all single size!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: 在造訪修道院時，女子必須穿上過膝的裙子，也不能露肩。 大部分的修道院備有裹巾給沒有準備而來的女性，但如果你自己有準備（特別是鮮豔色彩的款式），入口處的修士或修女就會對你投以微笑。 同樣地，男人必須穿著遮蓋膝蓋的長褲。 您也可以在入口處商借庫存，但這些衣物並未在每位使用者穿著後皆清洗，所以您在穿著這些裙子時可能會稍感不適。男士衣物皆為單一尺碼！
mt: When visiting a convent, women must wear skirts that cover the knees and cannot show their shoulders. Most convents have shawls for women who come without appropriate attire, but if you have your own (especially in bright colors), the monks or nuns at the entrance will smile at you. Similarly, men must wear long pants that cover the knees. You can also borrow from the stock at the entrance, but these clothes are not washed after each use, so you may feel a little uncomfortable wearing these skirts. Men's clothes are all single size!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: 如果你在冬季造訪北極或南極地區，你會經歷永夜，亦即太陽不會升到地平線以上。 因為天空幾乎整天都是黑的，提供了觀賞北極光的絕佳機會。 由於這些地區人口稀少，因此通常沒有光害的問題，您也可以欣賞到星星。
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will experience the midnight sun, when the sun does not rise above the horizon. Because the sky is almost black all day, it provides an excellent opportunity to watch the aurora. Because these areas are sparsely populated, there is usually no light pollution problem, and you can also enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: 在手機訊號到不了的偏遠地區，您可能只能選用衛星電話。 一般而言，衛星電話無法替代行動電話，因為您必須在戶外且對準衛星才能撥打電話。 船舶（包括遊樂船和有遠端資料與音訊需求的探險船）時常使用這項服務。 你所屬當地電信服務業者，應可提供更多連線到此服務的資訊。
mt: In remote areas where cell phone signals are not available, you may have to use a satellite phone. In general, satellite phones cannot replace cell phones because you must be outdoors and pointed at a satellite to make a call. Ships, including pleasure boats and exploration vessels with remote data and audio requirements, often use this service. Your local telecommunications service provider should be able to provide more information on connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: 摩爾多瓦共和國的首都是基希涅夫。當地的官方語言是羅馬尼亞語，但也廣泛使用俄語。 摩爾多瓦是一個多種族的共和國，飽受種族衝突問題之苦。 1994 年，這場衝突導致摩爾多瓦東部出現了一個自稱為聶斯特河沿岸共和國的國家。該國擁有自己的政府和貨幣，但並未獲得任何聯合國成員國的承認。 儘管政治協商失敗，摩爾多瓦的這兩個部份之間，已重新建立起經濟連結。 摩爾多瓦的主要宗教是東正教。
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The official language of the country is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of a breakaway state called the Transnistrian Moldovan Republic, which had its own government and currency, but was not recognized by any United Nations member states. Despite political negotiations, economic links between Moldova's two parts have been reestablished. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: 由於蒙特維多位於赤道以南，因此當北半球冬季時，那裡是夏季，反之亦然。 蒙特維多位於亞熱帶地區，夏季時氣溫經常超過攝氏 30 度。 那裡的冬天寒意有時會騙人，因為氣溫很少低於零下，但風加上濕度，讓人感覺比溫度計上顯示的冷多了。 沒有特定的「雨季」及「旱季」，全年雨量大約是平均分配。
mt: Because of its location south of the equator, Montevideo is in summer when the northern hemisphere is in winter, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics, and summer temperatures often exceed 30 °C. Winter can be deceiving, as temperatures rarely fall below zero, but wind and humidity make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There is no distinct "rainy season" or "dry season," and rainfall is evenly distributed throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: 我們將擅自加上去的壁畫或潦草字跡稱為塗鴉。 雖然這絕不是現代才有的現象，但提到塗鴉，或許大部分的人想到的都是年輕人用噴漆破壞公共或私人財產。 不過，現今已有很多知名的塗鴉藝術家、塗鴉活動和「合法」塗鴉牆。這類的塗鴉繪畫通常類似於藝術品，而非難以辨別的標誌。
mt: We call the graffiti or scribbles we add ourselves "graffiti." Although this is not a modern phenomenon, when we think of graffiti, most people think of young people using spray paint to vandalize public or private property. However, there are now many well-known graffiti artists, graffiti activities, and "legal" graffiti walls. These graffiti paintings are usually similar to art, not easily identifiable as a logo.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: 在某些節慶中，參加音樂節的大部分遊客都會選擇在現場露營，而且他們大多認為這是體驗的重要環節。 如果你想近距離觀賞活動，你必須提早進去，找到一個靠近音樂演奏的露營地點。 請記得，就算主舞台的音樂演出結束了，音樂祭其它地方的表演仍有可能持續到深夜。 針對有幼童的家庭，有些節慶會場會安排專屬的露營區域。
mt: At some festivals, most of the festival's attendees will choose to camp on site, and they mostly believe that this is an important part of the experience. If you want to get close to the action, you'll need to get in early and find a campsite near the music performances. Remember that even after the main stage performances are over, performances in other areas of the festival may continue until late at night. Some festivals will have designated camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: 由於大多數印第安人村莊的所在地都非常遙遠，除非到阿布奎基或聖塔菲，否則不會有太多夜生活。 不過，上面列出的賭場幾乎全都有供應飲料，其中的幾個賭場亦會請來知名的娛樂表演（主要是阿爾伯克基和聖塔菲周遭鄰近的較大賭場）。 提醒您：這兒的小鎮酒吧並非總適合外州來的遊客閒逛。 一方面是因為新墨西哥北部有嚴重的酒駕問題，而且小鎮酒吧附近的酒醉駕駛特別多。
mt: Most Indian Pueblos are far from the city, so unless you're going to Albuquerque or Santa Fe, there's not much nightlife. However, most of the casinos listed above serve alcohol, and a few of the larger casinos in the Albuquerque and Santa Fe area will bring in some big-name entertainment. Note: The bars in these small towns are not always the best place for out-of-state visitors to hang out. One reason is that there is a serious drunk driving problem in the northern part of the state, and there are a lot of drunk drivers around the bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: 當地主要的啤酒是「第一」，它不是口味複雜的啤酒，而是順口和清爽的啤酒。另一款當地啤酒稱為「曼塔」。 雖然也有許多法國酒，但紐西蘭及澳洲酒可能較經得起長途運送。 當地自來水十分安全，可直接飲用，但如果不放心，也很容易能買到瓶裝水。 對澳洲人來說，「白咖啡」是外來的點子。濃縮咖啡是「espresso」，卡布奇諾則是咖啡上擠滿高聳的鮮奶油（非奶泡），而茶則不含牛奶。 熱巧克力的水準符合比利時標準。果汁很貴，但非常好喝。
mt: 1. The main beer is "First", it is not a complex beer, but a smooth and refreshing beer. Another local beer is called "Mantua". Although there are many French wines, New Zealand and Australian wines may be more durable for long-distance transportation. Local tap water is very safe and can be drunk directly, but if you are not sure, bottled water is also easy to buy. For Australians, "white coffee" is a foreign idea. Concentrated coffee is "espresso", cappuccino is coffee with a high-standing fresh cream (not foam), and tea is not milk. The standard of hot chocolate is in line with the Belgian standard. Juice is expensive but very delicious.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: 瓜拉尼人是居住於現今巴拉圭東部最重要的原住民族，過著半游獵的生活，同時也從事自給農業。 查科地區是瓜庫魯和帕亞瓜等其他原住民部落的家園，這些原住民以打獵、採集和捕魚維生。 16 世紀，巴拉圭（之前被稱為「印度的巨型省份」）是因著西班牙征服者和原住民的相遇而誕生的。 西班牙人開始了長達三個世紀的殖民時期。 自從 1537 年亞松森建城以來，巴拉圭就設法保持當地的諸多特色與風貌。
mt: The Guaraní are the most important indigenous people in the eastern part of present-day Paraguay, living a semi-nomadic life, while also practicing subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region is the home of the Guakurú and Payaguá, other indigenous peoples who live by hunting, gathering, and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay (formerly known as "the province of the Indies") was born from the meeting of Spanish conquerors and indigenous peoples. The Spanish began a three-century-long colonial period. Since the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has sought to maintain many of the local features and characteristics.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: 巴黎人有著自我中心、無禮與自大的惡名。 雖然在巴黎生活就要表現出最好的一面，這種說法往往只是不正確的刻板印象，不過言行舉止表現出 「bien élevé」（有教養）的樣子，還是比較容易讓你左右逢源。 如果您展現了基本的禮節，巴黎人表面上的粗率無禮就會迅速消失。
mt: Parisians have a reputation for being self-centered, rude and arrogant. While living in Paris, you should always put your best foot forward, but this reputation is often just an incorrect stereotype. If you show basic etiquette, the Parisians' surface rudeness will quickly disappear.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: 巴黎人有著自我中心、無禮與自大的惡名。 雖然在巴黎生活就要表現出最好的一面，這種說法往往只是不正確的刻板印象，不過言行舉止表現出 「bien élevé」（有教養）的樣子，還是比較容易讓你左右逢源。 如果您展現了基本的禮節，巴黎人表面上的粗率無禮就會迅速消失。
mt: Parisians have a reputation for being self-centered, rude and arrogant. While living in Paris, you should always put your best foot forward, but this reputation is often just an incorrect stereotype. If you show basic etiquette, the Parisians' surface rudeness will quickly disappear.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail通勤鐵路在開普敦及周圍地區的車廂有兩種艙等：MetroPlus（也稱為頭等艙）和 Metro（也稱為三等艙）。 MetroPlus 艙等較舒適且較不擁擠，價格雖然稍貴一些，但還是比一般的歐洲地鐵票便宜。 所有列車都有 MetroPlus 與 Metro 兩種車廂；MetroPlus 車廂都在最靠近開普敦的方向的列車尾端。
mt: MetroRail commuter trains in Cape Town and its surrounding areas have two classes of carriages: MetroPlus (also known as first class) and Metro (also known as third class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, and while the price is slightly higher, it is still cheaper than a typical European subway ticket. All trains have MetroPlus and Metro carriages; MetroPlus carriages are always at the rear of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: 遊客可能會遇到在自己的家鄉不常見的動物害蟲。 害蟲會破壞食物、引發不適，更糟糕的話可能造成過敏反應、散布毒液或傳播傳染病。 傳染病本身，或藉力傷害或殺害人的危險動物，通常不屬於害蟲。
mt: Visitors may encounter pests that are not commonly seen in their home countries. Pests can destroy food, cause discomfort, and in the worst case, cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit disease. Diseases themselves, or by force of injury or kill people, usually pests are not.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: 每一間雜貨店都有販售預付電話卡，種類多到不知如何選擇，這些電話卡可以用於付費電話或普通的電話。 雖然大部分的預付卡都可以打電話到任何國家，但某些預付卡會提供特定幾個國家優惠通話費率。 通常可以透過撥打一支免付費電話號碼來取得這些服務，大多數手機可以免費撥打該電話號碼。
mt: Every convenience store has a prepaid phone card, and there are so many to choose from that it's hard to know which one to pick. These phone cards can be used for pay phones or regular phones. Although most prepaid cards can be used to call any country, some prepaid cards offer special rates for a few countries. Usually, you can get these services by dialing a toll-free number, and most cell phones can dial this number for free.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: 十六湖國家公園林木蔥鬱，以山毛櫸、雲杉和樅樹為主，融合了高山和地中海植物景觀。 由於它的微氣候範圍、相異的土壤及不同海拔高度，使它擁有相當廣泛多樣的植物群落。 此地區也擁有種類極為豐富的動物和鳥類。 那裡有歐洲棕熊、狼、老鷹、貓頭鷹、猞猁、野貓和松雞等稀有動物群，此外也有許多較常見的物種
mt: 16 Lakes National Park is a forested area with spruce, fir and pine as the main trees, with a mix of alpine and Mediterranean plant landscapes. Due to its microclimate range, different soil and different altitudes, it has a very wide variety of plant communities. The area also has a very rich variety of animals and birds. There are brown bears, wolves, eagles, owls, lynx, cats and pheasants among the rare animal species, as well as many more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: 媒體公司經常的在此舉的目的上說謊，聲稱這是為了「防止盜版」。 實際上，區域碼完全無法防止盜版；逐位元複製的光碟可以在任何設備上，如同原版般正常播放。 實際目的是讓公司更能掌控他們的市場；一切都是為了賺錢。
mt: Media companies often lie about the purpose of this, claiming it is to "prevent piracy".  In reality, region codes are completely unable to prevent piracy; discs copied bit-for-bit can be played normally on any device just like the original.  The real purpose is to allow companies to better control their markets; it's all about the money.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: 回國時，可能不必經過移民署檢查，或僅是例行公事，但海關控管就可能十分惱人。 一定要知道可攜帶及不可攜帶的物品種類，若攜帶超出規定數量必須詳實申報。
mt: 1. When returning to Taiwan, you may not have to go through immigration inspection, or it may be a routine inspection, but customs control may be very annoying. You must know the types of items that can be carried and those that cannot be carried, and if you carry more than the specified quantity, you must report in detail.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: 科查莫谷──智利首屈一指的攀岩地點，有南美優勝美地之稱，擁有各式各樣的大片花崗岩壁和峭壁。 山頂上有令人屏息的美景。世界各地的攀岩者持續在潛力無窮的岩壁上開創新的路線。
mt: The Cochamó Valley, Chile's premier climbing destination, is known as the "South American Yosemite," with a variety of large granite walls and cliffs. The top has breathtaking views. Climbers from around the world continue to pioneer new routes on the endless walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: 如果你想飛遍整個南半球，航班和目的地的選擇十分有限的，因為缺乏越洋路線。 沒有任何航空聯盟提供橫跨南半球所有三大洋之航線（天合聯盟未橫跨任一海洋）。 但星空聯盟涵蓋了所有航線，除了南太平洋東部從智利聖地牙哥到大溪地的航線以外，該航線是由寰宇一家的南美航空集團所運作。 如果你想跳過南太平洋及南美洲西岸，此航班並非唯一的選項。（見下文）
mt: If you want to fly across the entire Southern Hemisphere, your flight and destination choices are very limited, as there are few intercontinental routes. No airline alliance offers a route that crosses all three oceans of the Southern Hemisphere (the Star Alliance does not cross any ocean). But the Star Alliance covers all routes, except for the route from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti in the South Pacific, which is operated by the South American group of Iberia. If you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America, this flight is not the only option. (See below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: 國際上有近兩百個跑步旅遊組織。這些組織大多數獨立運作。 Go Running Tours 接續 Global Running Tours 成立，在四大洲串連了數十個觀光路跑供應商。 他們的總部位於巴塞隆納的 Running Tours Barcelona 和哥本哈根的 Running Copenhagen，位於布拉格的 Running Tours Prague 等各地組織也很快就加入他們。
mt: There are nearly two hundred running tourism organizations around the world. Most of these organizations operate independently. Go Running Tours is a continuation of Global Running Tours, connecting dozens of tourism providers across four continents. Their headquarters are in Barcelona, Spain, and Copenhagen, Denmark, and Prague, Czech Republic, and other local organizations soon joined them.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: 獵遊可說是非洲最吸引人的觀光元素，也是許多訪客旅程中的重點。 「Safari」一詞普遍是指欣賞壯麗的非洲野生動植物，特別是草原動植物的陸上旅行。 大象和長頸鹿這些動物往往會接近車子，因此標準裝備能讓你看得更清楚。 獅子、獵豹和花豹有時會害怕人靠近，比較適合用雙筒望遠鏡來觀察。 野生徒步之旅（也稱做叢林漫步﹑野生健行或遠足）包含登山，行程長短可以是幾小時或幾天。
mt: Safari is one of the most attractive elements of tourism in Africa, and a major focus of many visitors’ trips. The word “safari” is generally used to refer to the viewing of magnificent African wildlife, especially the wildlife of the savannah. Elephants and giraffes are often attracted to cars, so standard equipment can help you see better. Lions, leopards and cheetahs sometimes fear people approaching, and are better suited for binoculars to observe. Wildlife hiking (also called bushwalking, wildlife hiking or hiking) includes hiking, and the length of the trip can be a few hours or a few days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: 越多人的旅行團價格越便宜，所以若是單獨或與一名朋友外出旅行，可以與其他人結伴組成四到六人的團體，以降低個人單價。 但您不需要太擔心，因為通常都會有許多旅客四處詢問加入旅行團。 這似乎更像是某種騙人以為他們必須付更多錢的招數。
mt: The more people in your tour group, the cheaper the price, so if you're traveling alone or with a friend, you can join up with other people to form a group of four to six people to lower your individual price. But you don't have to worry too much, because usually there are many tourists asking to join the tour group. This seems like some kind of scam to trick people into paying more money.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: 舊金山的經濟雖然與其身為世界級觀光景點息息相關，不過這裡的經濟活動其實非常多元。 就業人口最多的領域為專業服務、公家機關、金融、貿易和觀光。 音樂、電影、文學和流行文化中的頻繁描述使這座城市及其地標變得舉世聞名。 舊金山發展出了大規模的觀光基礎建設，包括無數家飯店、餐廳，以及一流的會議設施。 舊金山也是國內品嘗韓國菜、泰國菜、印度菜和日本菜等其他亞洲料理的最佳去處之一。
mt: While San Francisco's economy is closely related to its status as a world-class tourist destination, its economic activities are actually quite diverse. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Frequent descriptions in music, film, literature, and popular culture have made this city and its landmarks famous worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure, including numerous hotels, restaurants, and first-class conference facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to sample Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese cuisine, among other Asian cuisines.

src: 提前預訂可以讓旅人安心，知道一抵達目的地就有睡覺的地方。 旅行社通常會跟特定的飯店合作，不過你也可以透過旅行社預訂其他類型的住宿，比方露營地。 旅行社提供的套裝行程通常會包括早餐和往返機場的交通，甚至提供結合航班和飯店的套組。 如果您需要時間考慮提案或為您的目的地收集其他文件（如簽證）時，他們也可以為您保留預訂。 不過，若遇到任何需要改善的問題或有任何要求，應該要先聯絡旅行社，而非直接聯絡旅館。
mt: Booking in advance can give travelers peace of mind, knowing that they will have a place to sleep when they arrive at their destination. Travel agencies often work with specific hotels, but you can also book other types of accommodation through travel agencies, such as camping sites. Travel agencies often include breakfast and transportation to and from the airport in their package tours, and even offer combined flight and hotel packages. If you need time to consider the proposal or collect other documents for your destination (such as visas), they can also reserve your booking for you. However, if there are any problems that need to be improved or any requests, it is best to contact the travel agency rather than directly contacting the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: 即時文本翻譯應用程式 – 可自動將整段文本從一種語言翻譯成另一種語言的應用程式。 有些這種類型的應用程式甚至可翻譯現實世界中標誌或其他物件上的外文，用戶只要把智慧型手機對準這些物件。 翻譯引擎已有巨大的改進，現在通常提供或多或少正確的翻譯（和更少的胡言亂語），但因為翻譯結果仍可能完全是錯誤的，應對其持有一些小心謹慎的態度。 此類別中最著名的應用程式之一是 Google 翻譯，它可以在下載所需的語言資料後，進行離線翻譯。
mt: Instant text translation applications – Applications that can automatically translate entire text from one language to another. Some of these types of applications can even translate foreign text on real-world objects, if the user points their smartphone at the objects. Translation engines have made great strides, and now typically provide at least somewhat accurate translations (and fewer gibberish), but because the translation results may still be completely wrong, it is advisable to approach them with some caution. One of the most well-known applications in this category is Google Translate, which can perform offline translations after downloading the necessary language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: 雪崩並非異常現象；陡峭斜坡能累積的雪量有限，多餘的積雪會掉下形成雪崩。 問題是雪有黏性，因此需要一些契機才會滑落，而有些許的雪滑落後，才有可能帶動其他的雪塊崩落。 原初的觸發事件有時是太陽使雪升溫，有時是下了更多雪，有時是其它自然事件，但更常是人為。
mt: Avalanches are not unusual; steep slopes can only accumulate a limited amount of snow, and excess snow will slide down to form avalanches. The problem is that snow has a stickiness, so it needs some trigger to start sliding, and once a little snow starts sliding, it can bring down other snow chunks. The original triggering event can sometimes be the sun warming the snow, sometimes more snow falling, sometimes other natural events, but more often it is human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: 咖哩是以藥草和香料為底，加上肉類或蔬菜的菜餚。 咖哩依據液體含量多寡，而有「乾」或「濕」之分。 巴基斯坦和北印度內陸區的咖哩料理中常用到優格；南印度和印度次大陸的其他沿海地區則常改用椰奶。
mt: Curry is a dish in which meat or vegetables are cooked in a sauce flavored with spices. Curry is divided into "dry" and "wet" according to the amount of liquid in the dish. In the curries of Pakistan and the North Indian interior, yogurt is often used; in the curries of South India and the rest of the Indian subcontinent, coconut milk is often used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: 南極橫貫公路是一條一千六百公里長的道路，從羅斯海的麥克默多站一路通到南極。 它是壓實的雪地，裂縫也經過填補，有旗幟作為記號。只有駕駛專用拖拉機才能行駛，後方拖著載了燃油與物資的雪橇。 它們不太靈活，所以路徑必須沿著橫貫南極山脈繞著長長的彎路才能抵達高原上方。
mt: The Trans-Antarctic Highway is a 1,600-kilometer road that runs from McMurdo Station in Ross Sea all the way to the South Pole. It is a packed snow road, with cracks filled in and flags as markers. Only specially designed tractors can drive on it, with snow sleds behind them carrying fuel and supplies. They are not very maneuverable, so the route must follow the Trans-Antarctic Mountains around long bends to reach the high plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: 開車進入南部非洲是一種很好的方式，能看見該地區的所有美景，也能到達一般旅遊路線以外的地方。 透過仔細規劃，乘坐普通車輛也能做到，但強烈建議選擇四輪傳動車，而且許多地點只有高軸距的四輪傳動車才能抵達。 規劃時請牢記在心，南非雖然安定，但並非所有鄰國都如此。 各國的簽證要求和費用不盡相同，也會跟所屬國家或地區有關。 每個國家也有各自的法律，要求車內必須放置哪些緊急物品。
mt: Driving through southern Africa is a great way to see the region's sights and get to places off the beaten track. It can be done in a regular car, but it's strongly recommended that you choose a four-wheel-drive vehicle, as many places can only be reached by high-clearance four-wheel-drive vehicles. When planning your trip, remember that while South Africa is stable, not all of its neighbors are. Visa requirements and fees vary from country to country and are often based on your country or region of origin. Each country has its own laws, requiring certain emergency items to be kept in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: 幫別人帶東西 - 絕對不要讓您的行李離開視線，特別是在您出入國境時。 你可能會在不知情的情況下發現自己被利用，變成攜帶毒品者，這會給你帶來很大的麻煩。 這包含排隊等候，因為緝毒犬可以在不另行通知的情況下，隨時查驗。 有些國家就算對初犯也有嚴重的刑罰，包含 10 年以上徒刑或死刑。 無人看管的包袋是竊賊的目標，也可能引起提防炸彈威脅的相關單位注意。
mt: 1. Helping others carry things - Never let your luggage out of your sight, especially when you are entering or leaving the country. You may find yourself unwittingly being used as a drug mule, which will cause you a lot of trouble. This includes waiting in line, because drug-sniffing dogs can be checked at any time without notice. Some countries have severe penalties for first-time offenders, including 10 years or more in prison or death. Unattended bags are a thief's target and may also attract the attention of bomb threat-related units.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: 早晨讓家裡充盈濃郁的咖啡香，夜間則來點放鬆身心的洋甘菊茶。 你居家度假時有充足時間犒賞自己，還可以花些時間培養特別的興趣。 如果你更有冒險精神，你可以把握機會榨果汁或打一些果昔： 或許你會找到某種簡單的飲品，可以讓你在回歸日常生活時搭配早餐飲用。 如果你生活在一個具有各種飲酒文化的城市裡，你應該去周遭平常不太去的酒吧或酒館。
mt: In the morning, let your home be filled with the rich aroma of coffee, and in the evening, relax with a soothing chamomile tea. You have ample time to indulge yourself at home, and you can also take time to cultivate a special interest. If you are more adventurous, you can take advantage of the opportunity to juice or make some fruit smoothies: perhaps you will find a simple drink that you can use to complement your breakfast when you return to your daily life. If you live in a city with a variety of drinking cultures, you should go to the bars or pubs that you usually don't go to.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: 早晨讓家裡充盈濃郁的咖啡香，夜間則來點放鬆身心的洋甘菊茶。 你居家度假時有充足時間犒賞自己，還可以花些時間培養特別的興趣。 如果你更有冒險精神，你可以把握機會榨果汁或打一些果昔： 或許你會找到某種簡單的飲品，可以讓你在回歸日常生活時搭配早餐飲用。 如果你生活在一個具有各種飲酒文化的城市裡，你應該去周遭平常不太去的酒吧或酒館。
mt: In the morning, let your home be filled with the rich aroma of coffee, and in the evening, relax with a soothing chamomile tea. You have ample time to indulge yourself at home, and you can also take time to cultivate a special interest. If you are more adventurous, you can take advantage of the opportunity to juice or make some fruit smoothies: perhaps you will find a simple drink that you can use to complement your breakfast when you return to your daily life. If you live in a city with a variety of drinking cultures, you should go to the bars or pubs that you usually don't go to.

src: 在哈爾多斯維克村能看到鄰近的東島景色，且有一座而特別的八角形教堂。 在教堂的院落中，一些墓碑上有一些有趣的鴿子大理石雕像。 值得在這座迷人村莊漫步半小時。
mt: You can see the nearby East Island scenery from the village of Hardanger Vidda, and there is a special octagonal church. In the courtyard of the church, some tombstones have some interesting dove marble sculptures. It is worth walking for half an hour in this charming village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: 到某些國家旅遊或出差的短期停留可能不需要簽證，但以國際學生身分前往，需要待的時間通常比觀光客更長。 通常，若要在外國居住一段較長的時間，你必須事先取得簽證。 學生簽證的要求和申請程序通常與一般觀光或商務簽證不同。 在大部分的國家/地區，您都要提供欲就讀的教育機構所給的錄取通知書，同時也要提供至少能支持您完成第一年課程的財力證明。 請向您欲前往求學的機構及該國移民當局諮詢詳細要求。
mt: Short-term stays for business or tourism may not require a visa, but as an international student, you will need to stay for a longer period of time. In most cases, you will need to obtain a visa before you can stay in a foreign country for a longer period of time. The requirements and application procedures for student visas are usually different from those for tourist or business visas. In most countries, you will need to provide a letter of acceptance from the educational institution you will be attending, as well as proof of financial support for at least the first year of your studies. Please consult the institution you will be attending and the immigration authorities of the country you will be studying in for detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: 尤其在夏天，如果你決定徒步穿過雨林，就必須提防蚊子。 即便當你準備開車穿越亞熱帶雨林，你打開車門進入車內的數秒間，已足夠讓蚊子跟著你進到車內。
mt: Especially in the summer, if you decide to walk through the rainforest, you have to watch out for mosquitoes. Even if you are about to drive through the tropical rainforest, the number of seconds it takes to open the car door and get in the car is enough for mosquitoes to follow you into the car.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: 蘇達班是世界上最大的沿海紅樹林帶，從海岸綿延 80 公里（50 英里）直達孟加拉與印度內地。 巽達班斯森林已列入聯合國教科文組織世界遺產。位於印度境內的區域稱為巽達班斯國家公園。 這片森林不是只有紅樹林沼澤，也包含一部分曾遍及恆河平原、如今所剩無幾的巨大叢林。 巽達班斯森林面積達 3,850 平方公里，其中約三分之一為水域或沼澤。 蘇達班自 1966 年起即為野生動物保護區，目前該地區估計有 400 隻孟加拉虎，以及約 30,000 隻梅花鹿。
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 kilometers (50 miles) inland from the coast to the mainland of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans Reserve Forest is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called Sundarbans National Park. The Sundarbans is not just a mangrove swamp, but also contains a remnant of the once vast forest that covered the Ganges Delta. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 square kilometers, of which about one-third is water or swamp. The Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and is estimated to have 400 Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: 全世界有五千多種語言，其中超過二十種最少都有五千萬的使用者。 此外，書面字詞通常比口語字詞容易理解，尤其是傳達地址時，因為地址通常很難清楚地發音。 很多國家全國上下都能說流利的英語，而能稍微理解英語的國家更多，特別是這些國家的年輕人。 想像一下，在多倫多一間餐廳裡，各有一名曼徹斯特人、波士頓人、牙買加人和雪梨人圍坐在一張桌子吃晚餐。 他們以獨特口音和地方俚語說著自己家鄉的故事，逗彼此開心。
mt: 1,500 languages are spoken around the world, with more than 20 of them having more than 500 million speakers. In addition, written words are usually easier to understand than spoken words, especially when giving directions, as directions are often difficult to pronounce clearly. Many countries have people who speak English fluently, and even more countries have people who can understand English, especially the younger generations. Imagine four people from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica, and Sydney sitting at a table in a restaurant in Toronto, telling stories about their hometowns in their unique accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: 巴士全天從區間巴士站（河的對岸）出發，但大多數的巴士會在 06:30 和 07:30 之間離站，尤其是那些前往東方和賈卡爾 / 布姆唐的巴士。 由於區間巴士經常客滿，建議您提前幾天購買車票。 大部分的區域都可藉由舒適堅固的日本 Coaster 巴士到達。 共乘計程車是旅行至鄰近地方快速且舒適的方式，例如帕羅（150 努）和普那卡（200 努）。
mt: Buses leave from the intercity bus station (across the river) all day, but most buses leave between 6:30 and 7:30, especially those going to the east and Jacaré/Bum Bum. As intercity buses are often full, it is recommended that you buy your ticket a few days in advance. Most of the region can be reached by comfortable and sturdy Japanese Coaster buses. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable way to travel to nearby places, such as Paraty (150 reais) and Parnaíba (200 reais).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: 因為相比之下較難進入，因此「廷布克圖」逐漸成為遙遠異國的象徵。 現今的廷巴克圖是一座貧困的城鎮，但過往名聲讓其成為旅遊景點，且有一座機場。 1990 年，它因為沙漠沙塵的威脅而被列入瀕危世界遺產名單。 這是亨利．路易斯．蓋茨的 PBS 特別節目《非洲世界奇觀》的主要停留地點之一。 該城市與國內的其它城市有明顯差異，因為它偏向擁有阿拉伯而不是非洲風格。
mt: Because it was more difficult to reach, Timbuktu gradually became a symbol of a distant foreign land. Today's Timbuktu is a poor town, but its past reputation made it a tourist destination, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was listed as a World Heritage Site in danger because of the threat of desert sand. It is one of the main stops of the PBS special "Africa's Hidden Treasures" by Henry Louis Gates. The city has a distinct difference from other cities in the country because it is more Arab than African in style.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: 帕運會將於 2021 年 8 月 24 日至 9 月 5 日舉行。其中幾個項目將在日本其他地方進行。 東京將成為唯一一座主辦過兩場夏季奧林匹克運動會的亞洲城市，上一次舉辦是在 1964 年。 如果你是在宣布延期之前就預訂了 2020 年的機票和住宿，你面臨的情況可能有點棘手。 取消政策各家不同，但三月底後大多數因新冠病毒所設的取消政策並沒有延長到 2020 年七月，亦即原定舉辦奧運的日期。 預計大多數的活動票價會落在 2,500 到 130,000 日幣之間，而一般票價約為 7,000 日幣。
mt: 2020 Summer Olympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other parts of Japan. Tokyo will be the first Asian city to host two Summer Olympic Games, the last one was in 1964. If you booked your flight and accommodation before the announcement of the postponement, you may be in a bit of a pickle. Cancellation policies vary, but most cancellation policies set up due to the coronavirus were not extended to July 2020, the original date of the Olympics. Tickets are expected to cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, with general admission costing around 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: 龍捲風是一個極低氣壓的旋轉空氣柱，它把周圍的空氣往內、往上吸。 它們會產生強風（通常為 100-200 英里/小時），且可以將重物抬舉至空中，並隨著龍捲風移動。 它們開始時是從風暴雲中下降造成的漏斗，而後在接觸地面時成為「龍捲風」。
mt: Tornadoes are rotating columns of air that suck in the surrounding air. They can produce strong winds (usually 100-200 miles per hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air and move them with the tornado. They start as funnel clouds that drop from thunderstorm clouds and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: 如果您要訪問的國家受到旅行建議的限制，則您的旅遊健康保險或行程取消保險可能會受到影響。 除了自己查詢，你可能也會想諮詢政府的意見，不過他們的建議是為其公民而設計的。 舉例來說，在中東的美國公民可能會面臨有別於歐洲人或阿拉伯人的處境。 諮詢意見只是對某國政治情況的簡短摘要。 與其他地方能取得的詳細資訊相比，他們所提供的觀點常較粗略、籠統且過於簡化。
mt: If you are visiting a country under a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or trip cancellation insurance may be affected.  In addition to your own research, you may also want to consult the government's opinion, but their recommendations are designed for its citizens.  For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different circumstances than Europeans or Arabs.  Consulting opinions is just a brief summary of the political situation in a country.  Compared to the detailed information available in other places, their views are often rough, general, and overly simplified.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: 旅行社早從十九世紀就存在了。如果旅行目的地的自然環境、文化、語言超出旅客本身的經驗，或者是低收入國家，那麼旅行社就是一個不錯的選擇。 雖然大部分的旅行社願意承接大多數的一般預訂，但是許多旅行社專營特定類型的旅行、預算範圍或目的地。 最好是找經常預訂類似旅程的旅行社為您效勞。 你可以在網站或商店展示區看到旅行社推廣的行程。
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. If the natural environment, culture, or language of the destination is beyond the traveler's own experience, or if it is a low-income country, a travel agency is a good choice. Although most travel agencies are willing to accept most general reservations, many travel agencies specialize in a particular type of travel, budget range, or destination. It is best to find a travel agency that often makes similar journeys for you. You can see the travel agency's itinerary on the website or display area.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: 旅行開始前或當你旅行時，有許多必須考慮的事。 旅行時你會發現一切都和「家鄉」不一樣。無論禮節、法律、食物、交通、住宿、行為準則和語言等等，多少都會和你居住的地方有點差異。 這是您需要一直銘記於心的事情，才不會讓您感到失望，或甚至是對當地的做事方式感到厭惡。
mt: 1. Before you travel or while you are traveling, there are many things to consider. When you travel, you will find that everything is different from "home." Whether it is etiquette, law, food, transportation, accommodation, behavioral norms and language, etc., there will be some differences from where you live. This is something you need to keep in mind, so that you will not be disappointed, or even hate the way things are done locally.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: 如果是第一次前往開發中國家，或是未曾到過的國家旅行的話，請不要低估可能的文化衝擊。 許多身經百戰的資深旅人到開發中國家旅行都感受過陌生文化的震撼，在這種地方很快就會累積大量需要調適的文化差異。 尤其在一開始的時候，可以考慮多花一些錢在西式風格及品質的飯店、餐飲及服務上，以幫助適應。 在您不了解當地的動物體系的地區，請勿睡在地上的床墊或墊子上。 如果你要在戶外露營，攜帶一張折疊床或吊床能讓你遠離蛇、蠍子等動物。
mt: If you are a first-time visitor to a developing country or a country you have never been to before, don't underestimate the cultural shock. Many seasoned travelers to developing countries have felt the impact of a foreign culture, and in these places you will quickly accumulate a large number of cultural differences that need to be adjusted. Especially at the beginning, consider spending a little more money on Western-style and quality hotels, restaurants and services to help you adapt. In areas where you are not familiar with the local animal system, do not sleep on the ground on mattresses or mattresses. If you are camping outdoors, bring a folding bed or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions, etc.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: 準備一份保單影本以及保險公司的聯絡資料並隨身攜帶。 上面必須記有保險公司的電子郵件地址和國際電話號碼，以便諮詢/授權和申請理賠。 在您的行李中及線上各保存一份副本（以電子郵件連同附件傳送給自己，或儲存在「雲端」）。 若攜帶筆電或平板電腦旅行，請在其記憶體或光碟中儲存備份（在沒有網際網路時仍可存取）。 並將保單／聯絡人複本提供給旅伴及願意協助的家中親友。
mt: 1. Prepare a copy of your insurance policy and contact information for your insurance company. Make sure it includes the email address and international phone number of your insurance company so you can consult/authorize and file a claim. Keep a copy of the policy and contact information in your luggage and online (send yourself an email with the attachment, or store it in the “cloud”). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a backup in the memory or disc of the device (you can access it without internet). Provide a copy of the policy and contact information to your travel companions and willing family members at home.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: 多年來存在許多不同的底片格式。標準的 35 公釐底片 (36×24 公釐負片) 是最常見的。 用完時，補充起來通常相當簡單，解析度堪可比擬現代的數位單眼相機。 有些中片幅底片相機使用 6 公分乘 6 公分的格式，更準確地說是 56 毫米乘 56 毫米負片。 這種格式的解析度幾乎是 35 釐米負片的四倍（3136 平方釐米相對於 864 平方釐米）。
mt: 35mm film has been the most common format for many years. The standard 35mm negative (36×24mm) is the most common. When finished, replenishing is usually quite simple, and the resolution is comparable to modern digital single lens reflex cameras. Some medium format cameras use a 6×6cm format, more accurately a 56mm×56mm negative. This format has a resolution of nearly four times that of 35mm film (3136 square millimeters compared to 864 square millimeters).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: 由於在家持續接觸在地細菌，您很有可能已經對它們免疫了。 但在世界的其他地方，當細菌群對您而言是新的，您更可能遇到麻煩。 此外，在溫暖的氣候下，細菌不但繁殖得更快，也能在體外存活較長的時間。 從而催生了「德里肚」、「法老的詛咒」、「蒙特祖瑪的復仇」等多種旅人腹瀉之別稱。 就像寒冷氣候常見的呼吸系統問題，腸道問題在炎熱氣候也相當普遍，而多數情況下確實很擾人，但並不真的危險。
mt: Because you are likely to be immune to the bacteria you are exposed to at home, you are more likely to have problems with bacteria that are new to you in other parts of the world. In addition, bacteria grow faster and can survive longer outside the body in warm climates. This has led to the naming of various traveler's diarrhea, such as "Delhi belly," "Pharaoh's curse," and "Montezuma's revenge." Like respiratory problems are common in cold climates, gastrointestinal problems are common in hot climates, and while they are often annoying, they are not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: 歐洲大陸雖然相對較小，但卻存在許多獨立國家。一般情況下，在數個國家間旅行代表著必須申請數個簽證，經歷多次護照檢查。 不過，就這方面來說，申根區的運作方式就像一個國家。 只要您待在此區域，一般而言，不必再次通過護照控制檢查站，即可出入邊境。 同樣的，如持有申根簽證，你就不需要分別申請每個申根會員國的簽證，從而節省了時間、金錢和文書作業。
mt: Although the European continent is relatively small, it contains many independent countries. In general, traveling between several countries means applying for several visas and undergoing multiple passport checks. However, in this regard, the Schengen Area operates as if it were one country. As long as you stay in this area, in general, you do not need to go through passport control checkpoints again to cross the border. Similarly, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa for each Schengen member country, thus saving time, money, and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: 圖坦卡門之墓 (KV62)。KV62 可能是山谷中最有名的墳墓了，它是霍華德·卡特在 1922 年發現的景象──年輕國王埋葬的地方、幾乎絲毫不受損壞的皇陵。 相較於大多數的皇陵，小而簡約的圖坦卡門墓穴顯得幾乎不值一顧。 若有任何人想要看當初人們因為試圖把木乃伊移出棺木而造成的損壞，他們只會大失所望，因為他們只能看見木乃伊的頭和肩膀。 陵墓裡各種令人歎為觀止的財富已不在陵墓內，而是被移往在開羅的埃及博物館。 時間不充裕的旅客，最好把時間花在其他地方。
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is probably the most famous tomb in the valley, the scene Howard Carter discovered in 1922 – the young king’s burial place, almost undisturbed by grave robbers. Compared to most of the other tombs, the small and simple tomb of Tutankhamun seems almost unimpressive. If anyone wants to see the damage caused by the attempt to remove the mummy from its coffin, they will be disappointed, as they can only see the head and shoulders of the mummy. The riches in the tomb are no longer there, but have been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Time-pressed tourists should spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: 寶雲島是熱門的一日遊或週末郊遊的地點，可進行划皮艇、健行、購物和餐飲等活動。 這個道地社區位於溫哥華附近的豪灣，乘坐從溫哥華市中心固蘭湖島出發的定時水上計程車就能輕鬆抵達。 對那些喜歡戶外活動的人來說，一定要到海天走廊旅行。 託 2010 冬季奧運的福，距離溫哥華車程 1.5 小時的惠斯勒又貴又出名。 冬季可享受北美洲最棒的滑雪場地，夏季則可體驗最正統的登山自行車。
mt: The island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway destination, offering activities such as kayaking, hiking, shopping and dining. The local community is located in West Vancouver, just a short ferry ride from downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy the outdoors, a trip along the Sea-to-Sky Highway is a must. Whistler, which hosted the 2010 Winter Olympics, is a 1.5-hour drive from Vancouver and is well-known for its pricey and posh accommodations. In the winter, it offers the best skiing in North America, and in the summer, the most authentic mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: 維多利亞瀑布鎮位在辛巴威西部，鄰近尚比亞邊境的利文斯頓，也很靠近波札那。 這個城鎮緊鄰著瀑布，瀑布是主要的景點，但此熱門的旅遊地點，為探險家和觀光客皆提供了許多長期停留的機會。 雨季（十一月至三月）水量會高出許多，瀑布會更加壯觀。 如果過橋或沿著瀑布旁的蜿蜒的小徑行走，保證你一定會被淋濕。 不過，正因為水量太大，觀看瀑布本身的視線會被大量的水遮蔽！
mt: Victoria Falls is located in the west of Zimbabwe, near the border with Zambia, and is also close to Botswana. The town is close to the falls, and the falls are the main attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers many opportunities for long stays for adventurers and tourists. The rainy season (November to March) will be much higher, and the falls will be more spectacular. If you cross the bridge or walk along the winding path by the falls, you will definitely be wet. However, because the water is too much, the view of the falls will be obscured by the large amount of water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: 針對一般攝影的規範也適用於錄影，甚至有更多的規定。 如果連拍張照片都不被允許，那麼就更不要想要將它錄成影片了。 若要使用無人機，請事先仔細確認可以拍攝什麼以及是否需要什麼許可或額外授權。 將無人機開到機場附近或飛過人群上方，就算不違反所在地法律，此舉幾乎都是壞主意。
mt: The same rules that apply to photography also apply to video, and in some cases there are even more restrictions. If you're not allowed to take a picture, you certainly shouldn't be filming it. If you want to use a drone, make sure you've checked what you can and can't film and whether you need any permits or additional authorizations. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd, even if it's not illegal in your country, is almost always a bad idea.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: 登記註冊是簽證流程中的附加要求。在某些國家/地區，你必須向當地政府機關登記入境和您的住宿地址。 可能須至當地警局填寫表單或走一趟移民局。 由於許多國家都有這條法律，當地飯店將處理登記事宜（請務必要求）。 在其他情況下，只有那些不住遊客住宿處的人才需要註冊。然而，這會讓法律更模糊不清，因此請事先確認。
mt: Registration is an additional requirement of the visa process. In some countries/regions, you must register with local authorities upon arrival and your address of stay. You may need to visit the local police station to fill out a form or go to the immigration office. Since many countries have this law, local hotels will handle the registration (please request it). In other cases, only those who do not stay at tourist accommodations need to register. However, this will make the law more ambiguous, so please confirm in advance.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: 旅行時參加志願活動是貢獻一己之力的好方法，而且這不只是單純給予。 在異國生活和當志工是接觸不同文化、認識新朋友、了解自己、取得某種看事情的角度，甚至是獲得新技能的一個好方法。 由於許多志願性的工作均提供食宿，而少數工作還支付微薄薪水，這也不失為放寬預算，以便在某個地方停留更久的好方法。
mt: 1. Volunteering is a great way to give back while you travel. It's not just about giving, though. Volunteering abroad is a great way to experience a new culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain a new perspective, and even learn new skills. Many volunteer programs provide food and lodging, and some even pay a small stipend, which is a great way to stretch your budget and stay in one place longer.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: 對很多美國家庭而言，前往迪士尼世界遊玩是心目中最重要的朝聖之旅。 最「典型」的行程包括飛往奧蘭多國際機場、搭巴士前往迪士尼飯店、在迪士尼園區玩上一週後再回家。 雖然有數不盡的各種可能，但多數人提到「去迪士尼世界」指的仍是這個。 許多在 eBay 或 Craigslist 等拍賣網站上賣出的票券，是已被使用過一部分的主題樂園多日聯票。 儘管這是很常見的情況，但迪士尼禁止這種行為，因為門票是不可轉讓的。
mt: For many American families, a trip to Disney World is a pilgrimage of the utmost importance. The most "typical" itinerary includes flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel, spending a week in the Disney theme parks, and then going home. While there are countless possibilities, most people who mention "going to Disney World" mean this. Many tickets sold on eBay or Craigslist are used multi-day theme park tickets. Although this is a common occurrence, Disney prohibits this behavior because tickets are non-transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: 若有人計畫要前往那些被視為戰爭區域的國家，就該接受專業訓練。 在網際網路上搜尋「敵意環境課程」大概就能找到本地公司的地址。 課程通常會以更加詳盡、經常輔以實務經驗的方式，來說明在此討論過的所有問題。 課程通常為期 2 到 5 天，會涉及角色扮演、大量的急救訓練，以及有時會做武器訓練。 有關荒野求生的書籍和雜誌很常見，但是涉及戰區的出版物卻很少。
mt: If you plan to travel to a country considered a war zone, you should take a professional training course. A search on the Internet for "hostile environment training" should give you the addresses of local companies. The courses usually go into more detail and often include practical experience on the issues discussed here. The courses usually last two to five days and include role-playing, extensive first aid training, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on wilderness survival are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: 在許多淨化水的方式中，有些可以更有效地處理特定威脅。 有些地區將水燒開一分鐘就夠了，在其他地區則需要數分鐘。 濾網的效力各不相同，如果您有任何疑慮，不妨向商譽良好的公司購買密封的瓶裝水。
mt: In many water purification methods, some are more effective at dealing with specific threats. Some areas can be purified in a minute by boiling, while in other areas it takes several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies, and if you have any concerns, you can buy bottled water from reputable companies.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: 離岸流是海浪打上海灘後斷開而折回的浪，通常會出現在礁石附近或類似的地方。 根據水下拓樸，回流的海浪會集中於少數較深的區域，並可能在此產生流向深水區的快速水流。 大部分致死原因都是在嘗試逆著海流游回去時用盡體力，此舉成功率可能非常渺茫。 一旦您脫離了洋流，游回岸並不比平時困難。 試著遊向一個不會再被困住的地方，或者，根據個人的游泳技術以及是否已有人注意到，也可以等待救援。
mt: 1. Rip currents are waves that break away from the shore and return to the sea. They are often found near reefs or similar areas. According to underwater topography, the returning waves will concentrate in a few deeper areas and may form fast currents flowing towards the deep water. Most of the deaths are caused by people trying to swim back against the current, which may be very difficult. Once you are out of the rip current, swimming back to shore is not much harder than usual. Try to swim to a place where you will not be trapped again, or, according to your swimming skills and whether anyone has noticed, you can wait for rescue.

src: 內陸水道是非常理想的主題度假場所。 例如參觀羅亞爾河谷及萊茵河谷的城堡，或乘船遊覽多瑙河耐人尋味的城市，或沿著伊利運河划船。 水道也會形成一些熱門的健行和單車路線。
mt: Inland waterways are ideal destinations for a holiday. For example, visiting the castles of the Rhine and the Rhone valleys, or cruising the Danube's picturesque cities, or canoeing along the Elbe. Waterways also form some popular hiking and cycling routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: 野生動物對攝影師來說可能是最有挑戰性的主題，並且需要結合運氣、耐心、經驗和良好的器材。 人們經常認為野生動物攝影沒什麼獨特之處，但就和一般攝影作品一樣，一張照片就能包含千言萬語。 野生動物攝影通常需要使用長焦鏡頭，而拍攝一群鳥類或一隻小型動物則需要其他鏡頭。 許多珍稀的動物很難發現，且有些公園可能會有限制商業化拍攝的規定。 野生動物可能很怕生或很有攻擊性，而生存環境可能很冷、很熱或很不友善。
mt: 1. Wild animals are the most challenging subjects for photographers and require a combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. People often think that wildlife photography is not very special, but just like any other photography, a single photo can contain a thousand words. Wildlife photography usually requires the use of a long focal length lens, while photographing a group of birds or a small animal requires other lenses. Many rare animals are difficult to find, and some parks may have restrictions on commercial photography. Wild animals may be shy or very aggressive, and the living environment may be very cold, very hot or very unfriendly.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
